**Focuses on rock music and offers you the ultimate listening experience.
***Highlights the vocal hierarchy and rhythm of rap music.
The personalized full RGB lights create a dynamic light effect that changes with the sound and gives you a cool cyber atmosphere.

It has 3 lighting modes: permanent, gradient and breathing.


Inspired by spaceships in the galaxy that combine both mechanical aesthetics and technological elements, CyberShell's body is made of a zinc alloy metal structure that adds a virtual and futuristic touch to the design.


Thanks to the classic control structure of the gears and buttons, CyberShell gives you irresistible control satisfaction by producing a crisp click sound when you toggle it.

The outer shell of the CyberShell uses a zinc alloy that requires special processes such as spraying and electroplating, making it heavier and more stable than conventional metals and has a metallic surface. The shield gives CyberShell greater stability when playing crazy bass, making your room shake with the sound wave, but the speaker does not.


Keep the hits coming all night long! Enjoy up to 13 hours of playtime with crystal-clear audio that lasts as long as you do.

*The 13-hour battery life is based on 50% volume without lighting.
**Other conditional factors may affect the battery life.
With Bluetooth 5.0, Type-C and AUX, CyberShell can stream music smoothly from your phone, tablet, laptop or any other devices. 

In TWS mode,  CyberShell A and B can form the left and right channels as independent stereo speakers.

*Two MUZEN devices of the same model are required to activate the TWS mode.
You can also use a pair of CyberShells as individual left and right channels without latency for your personal setup by connecting an adapter.

With a low latency of up to 60ms and the elimination of voice echoes, the CyberShell offers gamers an exciting gaming experience.

*Sound quality and Bluetooth transmission distance will be affected in this mode.
Just bring the epic music wherever you go! Compared to those traditional bulky speakers, CyberShell weighs only 1.05kg and is wireless,  which could be easily carried around when you are chilling at home, taking a shower, attending a party, working out or during road trips.
You don't need to rely on a device to operate your CyberShell. Do everything you need just with the buttons on your speaker.

Keep jamming without worrying about of water getting into your speaker. The water-resistant CyberShell is designed to play in less perfect conditions, so your music never has to stop.


Inspired by spaceships, CyberShell brings people a brand-new visual system speaker that the market has never seen before. Uniquely designed, the high-quality hard metal, mechanical exoskeleton shell, knobs in various shapes, and an astonishing halo reveal the ultimate product style of cyberpunk.With its unpredictable lighting and effects emerging in the atmosphere, CyberShell is perfect as a desktop speaker, offering you the shock of two speakers and two intelligent interconnections. It is built for your convenience and does not need to be controlled by an app. All playback functions can be controlled with simple and physical knobs or buttons. The goal is to provide people with a one-of-a-kind listening experience and visual impact that does not exist with previous speakers.

The product is currently in the second phase of production to continuously refine CyberShell's audio-visual effects and provide users with a better overall product experience.

As a token of gratitude to our early backers for being confident in the quality of MUZEN CyberShell, all perks during this campaign will come with a one-year warranty.

If you have any concerns or problems using CyberShell, please send us an email to info@muzenaudio.com and our team will be happy to assist you.






The previous campaign of MUZEN Wild Mini was supported by more than 2000+ backers around the world. Due to its tremendous success, we are back to bring you CyberShell, which is more powerful than ever and aims to give people a sense of the future. Check out what ourbackers said about the MUZEN Wild Mini! 






Muzen Audio is an exquisite and fashionable retro audio brand founded by designer Zeng Dejun. Mr. Zeng has focused on the field of sound engineering for over 40 years. Since childhood, he has been obsessed with audio technology and is considered the godfather of speakers from the era of tube amplifier speakers. To this day, Zeng Dejun has fought against time, reclaimed the classics of the golden radio age, and founded the brand "Muzen Audio." Muzen Audio preserves the humanistic feeling of warmth, adheres to the value of "hear the difference" and is committed to ensuring that everyone feels the joy of living in the Internet age.

Since its establishment, Muzen has continually pushed the boundaries and brought excitement to the industry. MUZEN's Cyber Shell Bluetooth speaker with light effects follows the company's design philosophy: "Aesthetically pleasing, great sound, user-friendly and entertaining." It is our eternal quest to make listening to audio sounds easier and better. Welcome to explore your Cyber Shell with impressive sound and visual experience.

story:
Your ultimate habit building guide light speaker: SENS2

We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence is a habit. But have you tried to build up a habit and failed eventually? Looking back, don't you want a product that supports you fully along your way to excellence? SENS2 is here to help. With the combination of an app, a bluetooth speaker with more than 1 million light color choices, SENS2 supports your health, your scheduling, your mood, and much more! Grab one for yourself to kick-start your journey to excellence with SENS2!

"Where your excellence come from"

 

 

Exercising is crucial to a healthy, fulfilling life, Sens2 is here to help achieving that

Sens2 is able to count for you with colours of light and sound upon your request. A few simple settings and Sens2 will be counting the time for you per workout and per break upon your choice of light colour.

 

We don’t let the atmosphere dictates how we feel; we create the atmosphere

Choose your desired colour that fits your mood or occasion with the colour sphere in the Sens2 app. Pick 1 out of 1 million colors available. Match with the right music to create the best atmosphere for the event.

We think an alarm with sound ain’t enough; why not record your own & choose the favorite light for each alarms?

Sens2 goes further than just producing sounds at the set time and date. Record your own voice to create the heart-warming reminder for your loved ones; pick the correct “reminder light” for the alarm. Missing an event is now virtually impossible.

We want you to sleep at the best moment & working up feeling the same

After a hard day of work, your sleep should be the most important time for your body to recover. Allow Sens2 to transit you from a tensed to relax with the sunset and wake up light. The light gets dimmer slowly for you to sleep sound and peaceful.

Water repellence with extra attached hook

Any place can feel like home now

Sens2 is pending rated IPX5. That means you can take it to your outdoor trip. With the attached metal hook, you can hang it at the top of your tent. Create brightness at ease with maximum safety even when you are out in the woods from now on.

 

Unique selling point:

Sens2 has a decent speaker with solid sound for you to enjoy your favourite music anywhere from your phone.

Place two SENS2 together, and you will achieve a True Wireless Stereo situation.

With its large battery at 18,500mWh, the Sens2 can play songs non-stop for more than 10 hours.

 

Create your habits with Sens2, make your life colorful.

24 LED lights on your command producing the best light upon your desire.

Enhanced alarm function, sunset and wake up light function, workout support function allows you to live your life with lights in ways you never thought of.

IPX5 water repellent rating gives you the potential of enjoying all of the above even at outdoors. Let SENS2 sing in the rain!

We understand the importance of portability nowadays. Thus we have added a small yet powerful carabiner at the bottom of SENS2. Now you can hang them on your travel backpack, or even at the top of the opened tent. Experience the joyfulness SENS2 brings anywhere, anytime.

Bottom carabiner-hook for hanging functions (limited perks, first come first served!)

We have 24 LED lights perfectly positioned to produce the best light spread for you to enjoy. 5W speaker with a base booster, including a cylindrical interior, means decent and solid speaker quality at all sound range. Handle and Carabiner holder means surprisingly high portability provided. After long hours of research and development, we are finally able to combine the best of various products out there, and infuse our own creativity to support you in creating your habits via vision and hearing.

What if it’s able to read your mind?

What if Sens2 designs your fitness program with you?

New features or updates on software/app planned for the future

We planned to develop SENS2 further with the following possible upgrades:

  • HIIT goes further with fitness program designer
  • Schedule with blinking lights/Alerts with weather forecasting setup
  • Mood & Music matching

Our main direction is to strengthen existing function e.g. HIIT with smooth 3rd party streaming app songs being played; smart scheduling with more customizations such as priority setting, extra number of reminders per task; more light changing patterns. 

To take it to another level, it is theoretically possible for SENS2 to sense your brainwave and reacts accordingly, providing you the best tune and light that inspires you the most at that particular moment.

Textured finish

We want it to be one of your favourite decoration in your room. So thought it through and decided to texturise the top and bottom of SENS2. This creates a high end feel and touch. Upgrade your room with SENS2 now!

Brushed mid housing

To achieve full support anytime, anywhere, we made sure the mid housing is fully brushed. It smoothens light passing through it for a constant light out at all viewing angles.

Buttons 

Perform quick controls to manipulate SENS2 even if your phone is not around you. Light modes, Light color, Tune volumes all at the tip of your fingers.

Portability

We made a handle on top for easy carrying, and a Bottom carabiner-hook for hanging functions during outdoor usage, turning the product into a portable multi-light lamp instantly.

Sound Quality

A decent tune can boost your mood, accompany you during tough times, or enlighten you when you feel stuck. That is why we care so much about the sound quality. Cylindrical Shaped, 5W speaker with a bass booster at the bottom are the 3 main features in terms of sound. Combine them and we get a perfect tune that does not disappoint.

True Wireless Stereo(TWS)

Place two SENS2 together, and you will achieve a True Wireless Stereo situation.

Simply do the same with the Sens2 app, and both the Sens2 will feedback you wuth sound and light, giving you a whole new level of sensual experience.

Non-Slip Capabilities

We understand accidents could happen. So we have placed some rubber underneath. Friction maximised, accident minimised. Problem solved.

SENS2 comes with different colors, Jet Black, Lemon, Indigo and Moonrock (limited edition!)  Choose the one that suits your home the most, and be stylish in no time.

 

 

 Hang Sens2 upside down, experience the joyfulness SENS2 brings anywhere, anytime.

 

Choose between:

Jet Black, Lemon, Indigo, Moonrock (Limited Edition)!

 

1. Starting charging Sens2 once you unpack it.

2. Meanwhile, search the app via App Store/Play store, download it.

3. Turn ON the Sens2.

4. Follow the guidelines in the app & connect your phone to your Sens2.

5. Kickstart your way of smart living!

 

Shipping 

We work closely with DHL to provide smooth air freight services, sending SENS2 right to your home.

 

 

 

We were inspired along the development of SENS2 and as you can see, it went through various outlooks. Through countless hours of engineering and design discussions and work, we came up with the shape as of right now as it provides a marvellous balance between sound quality, light quality and ease of use.

 

We held our very first exhibition booth at the  Hong Kong Trade and Development Council's Spring Electronic Fair 2019. It was truly inspiring to be in contact with the potential clients face to face.

 

Future of SENS2 and Soilife

Soilife aims at the provision of smart lifestyle products that supports human beings in all contexts. The success of SENS2 will bring limitless potential of the birth of all other kinds of products that are stuck in our mind. Your every support is extremely helpful.

David Ng – Co-founder

Keith Choi – Co-founder

As a team , we came from various backgrounds within the consumer electronics industry. We would like to express the difficulties of having a good product with the lack of interest due to the vast information flowing around the world.

Crowdfunding filters the information, and allow users to understand where we are coming from.

We are tired of reminders with sound and words only. Human beings has 5 senses, we can definitely use them to discipline ourselves. Everything can now start with the Sens2.

Your support is much appreciated and welcome. Every penny pushes us, and you, together towards this simple yet innovative product, and so much more potential in the future is hold-within.

Q. How do I choose the color?

A. We will send you a survey to collect color options , you can choose a different color or same color when you back more than one Sens2. (Pick your colour all you want and leave your choice in the comment section! We will strongly consider the most-picked-colour it when we reach our goal and reaching development stage!)

Q. When do you collect the mailing address information? 

A. We will send you a survey to collect mailing address information after the campaign ends. (You would have typed in your address info already by the moment you pledge on us! Everything is sorted ?) 

Q. How loud is the Sens2?

A. The speaker output is 5W. That is more than enough for some solid tunes playing in your room/ in the tent! We took care of your listening truly.)

Q. Does Sens2 fit for outdoor use?

A. Yes, Sens2 supports IPX5 water resistance rating, water-splash-worry-free! Don’t throw it into the river/bathtub/pool, though!

Q. Can Sens2 still work without connecting App?

A. Yes, Sens2 can work alone as a Bluetooth Speaker and Mood Light , however some features like “Work Out Support”, “Wake up/Sleep Light”, Enhanced Alarm” can only be activated with connecting to your smart phone. We truly recommend you to take your phone with you when using your Sens2. After all, who doesn’t take their phone with them anyways? (Even right before adult naptime I suppose…pick your light to set the mood.)

Q. Can I use Sens2 as camping lantern?

A. Yes, Sens2 comes with an extra attached hook at the bottom, it is designed for enjoying music even Sens2 is hanging upside down on the top of tent. Now you camp with whatever light you want! Wohoooo!

story:
What if there was a MIDI controller made for and by guitar-minded people like you? 

With Jammy EVO, you’ll finally get a creative tool to translate your guitar skills into playing any instrument there is, compatible with your computer and mobile devices.

 

Please note that the little box on the EVO's back will only be present at the early prototype stage. 

Apart from accurate polyphonic tracking and filtering out the unintended notes so you don’t have to edit your score manually, Jammy EVO provides you with handy Playability Extensions: 

Jammy EVO’s multi-channel MIDI output will allow you to assign different instruments to each string. How about playing drums on the lower E, dropping a bass line on A and D, then adding piano to the mix on G, B, and higher E without even having to switch among the instruments?

 You love the guitar for the expressive means it provides, doubting that any MIDI controller can replicate them?

 

Although Jammy EVO has a slightly different ‘feel’ than an analog instrument, with it, you’ll still be able to use the techniques like bending, hammer-ons, pull-offs, palm muting, left-hand muting and slides in your MIDI recordings.

Moreover, its mappable controls and built-in accelerometer will allow you to change parameters of filters and FX on the fly, giving your expressiveness yet another dimension!

 

Jammy In-Tuition is a music production course that consists of video lessons, interactive practices, and hands-on examples, with which you will learn how to:

  • understand the inner workings of music — beats, sound intervals, chord progressions
  • see and use the dynamics between harmony and melody
  • find sources for your ideas and bring those ideas to life with confidence and efficiency
  • record tracks with Jammy EVO in a DAW, master and distribute your creations

The reward price doesn't include a shipping price and any customs duties, taxes, fees, or any other country-specific charges, or brokerage fees.

180K – Pad Mode: Unlocked. With it, you'll be able to use the strings on Jammy EVO's bridge part as pressure-sensitive pads to control aftertouch, trigger note repeat, etc.

200K – Sampler Mode. Unlocked. This one will turn your Jammy EVO into a sampler: You'll be able to easily assign custom samples to any fret/string through Jammy EVO VST Plugin.

220K – Jammy MIDI Frame. Unlocked. An add-on MIDI frame featuring:

  • 5-pin DIN output
  • TRS MIDI output
  • 4 pressure-sensitive pads for percussion and samples
  • 3 push-knobs for filters control
  • 4 transport-control buttons
  • All controls are going to be programmable (any CC-message and step). The frame will fit both Original Jammy and Jammy EVO! 

Jammy MIDI Frame will be available as an upgrade option to all backers with 20% off of the future retail price!

Jammy EVO is the evolution of our current product — Jammy Guitar (NAMM’s “Best in Show” Award, Red Dot Award for Product Design.

Our main advantages stay — we use an enhanced version of our proprietary optical sensors with decreased latency, and two-piece construction that allows for tracking your left and right hands’ actions separately.

What also stays is our manufacturing facilities, supply chain, and, most importantly, our Team. Our band of engineers, designers, marketers, and customer support specialists consists of music aficionados and professionals who feel the fellow musician’s wants and needs.

We consider the community of Jammy Guitar players to be an extension of our core team. Early adopters and open-minded experimenters, the Jammy players are constantly willing to give feedback, which we regularly implement in improvements to Jammy Guitar’s firmware.
story_txt:
What if there was a MIDI controller made for and by guitar-minded people like you? With Jammy EVO, you’ll finally get a creative tool to translate your guitar skills into playing any instrument there is, compatible with your computer and mobile devices. 
Jammy EVO is also available in a left-handed version!

 

 

With Jammy EVO, you will get 15 regular-sized frets, the latency as low as 8—10 ms, and clean MIDI output at an affordable price.  

 
Please note that the little box on the EVO's back will only be present at the early prototype stage. Apart from accurate polyphonic tracking and filtering out the unintended notes so you don’t have to edit your score manually, Jammy EVO provides you with handy Playability Extensions: Jammy EVO’s multi-channel MIDI output will allow you to assign different instruments to each string. How about playing drums on the lower E, dropping a bass line on A and D, then adding piano to the mix on G, B, and higher E without even having to switch among the instruments? You love the guitar for the expressive means it provides, doubting that any MIDI controller can replicate them? Although Jammy EVO has a slightly different ‘feel’ than an analog instrument, with it, you’ll still be able to use the techniques like bending, hammer-ons, pull-offs, palm muting, left-hand muting and slides in your MIDI recordings.Moreover, its mappable controls and built-in accelerometer will allow you to change parameters of filters and FX on the fly, giving your expressiveness yet another dimension!
 



 

With Jammy EVO, it’s just plug and play — all you got to do is connect it to your computer, tablet, or phone via USB-C or wirelessly using Bluetooth.  

 
 


 

Jammy EVO is a class-compliant MIDI controller so it’ll work with any DAW (Ableton Live, GarageBand, Logic Pro, etc), virtual instrument, or notation software that accepts MIDI input!




 

The Jammy EVO VST plugin will make your experience seamless, allowing you to adjust your Jammy EVO from inside the DAW you’re using by changing tunings, sensitivity settings, and more.


 


 
 


Please note that the little box on the EVO's back will only be present at the early prototype stage — all the electronics will be neatly placed inside the EVO's body in the next iteration! 




 


Jammy In-Tuition is a music production course that consists of video lessons, interactive practices, and hands-on examples, with which you will learn how to:
understand the inner workings of music — beats, sound intervals, chord progressions
see and use the dynamics between harmony and melody
find sources for your ideas and bring those ideas to life with confidence and efficiency
record tracks with Jammy EVO in a DAW, master and distribute your creations



 The reward price doesn't include a shipping price and any customs duties, taxes, fees, or any other country-specific charges, or brokerage fees. 
180K – Pad Mode: Unlocked. With it, you'll be able to use the strings on Jammy EVO's bridge part as pressure-sensitive pads to control aftertouch, trigger note repeat, etc.200K – Sampler Mode. Unlocked. This one will turn your Jammy EVO into a sampler: You'll be able to easily assign custom samples to any fret/string through Jammy EVO VST Plugin.220K – Jammy MIDI Frame. Unlocked. An add-on MIDI frame featuring:
5-pin DIN output
TRS MIDI output
4 pressure-sensitive pads for percussion and samples
3 push-knobs for filters control
4 transport-control buttons
All controls are going to be programmable (any CC-message and step). The frame will fit both Original Jammy and Jammy EVO! 
Jammy MIDI Frame will be available as an upgrade option to all backers with 20% off of the future retail price! Jammy EVO is the evolution of our current product — Jammy Guitar (NAMM’s “Best in Show” Award, Red Dot Award for Product Design.Our main advantages stay — we use an enhanced version of our proprietary optical sensors with decreased latency, and two-piece construction that allows for tracking your left and right hands’ actions separately.What also stays is our manufacturing facilities, supply chain, and, most importantly, our Team. Our band of engineers, designers, marketers, and customer support specialists consists of music aficionados and professionals who feel the fellow musician’s wants and needs.We consider the community of Jammy Guitar players to be an extension of our core team. Early adopters and open-minded experimenters, the Jammy players are constantly willing to give feedback, which we regularly implement in improvements to Jammy Guitar’s firmware.
campaign_city: Claymont, New Castle, DE, United States

story:
Sentien Audio is the audio headset you can wear all day and it does not block your ears. You can control your device through tap, gesture, and voice controls—all on Sentien Audio.  Put it on in the morning and forget about wearing it. Just like your wristwatch. 

No ear fatigue. Stay aware of your surroundings. Communicate and listen naturally. 


 

Don't take our word for it — see people's reactions to trying the headset for the first time. 

 

 

Bone conduction technology sends audio directly to your inner ear, and serotonin straight to your brain. You don't just hear your music like you're at a concert—you feel it in your bones.


 

...that you're listening to Miley Cyrus' 'The Climb' on repeat at the office. You're the only one who can hear it, whether you’re waiting for the subway or carpooling home.    

 

 

Even if you're working from home, Sentien Audio's noise-cancelling microphones make your Zoom meeting feel like you're face to face. Minus your barking dog.



 

You’ll feel the difference the first time you slide Sentien Audio into place. Adjust the size of the titanium band to perfectly fit your head size and shape. The ergonomic design will make it seem like the headset vanished.

 

The white mark is only a reference to show the adjustment in action.

 

Not just different sizes. Different shapes as well.
 

 

Over 10 hours of continuous playback of your favorite heavy metal playlist. Or make one charge last for days with normal use. 



 

 

 

 

You can customize the commands you want to use in the Sentien Connect app. Upgrade Sentien Audio with new functions as we continue adding features.


Each side of the headset supports 6 intuitive gestures.


Configure each gesture to perform the action you want in the Sentien Connect app.
 

Create even more custom actions with 3rd party applications.

 

Play / Pause action via Tap.

 

Choose the gesture, and assign it an action.

 


 

Now your voice assistant goes with you everywhere for instant access as natural as a conversation. Activate your favorite AI assistant with a gesture of your choice. 


 

Trigger your favorite AI assistant with a gesture of your choice.

 

 

Universal USB-C Charging.

 

Let's talk more human now. We use Sentien Audio prototypes daily.  I am editing this page and listening to music and the reaction videos via Sentien Audio prototype.

We were at the pre-production stage. Now that the Kickstarter campaign has ended, we're kicking off tooling and working towards mass production. 

 

 

We went through it all. From ideas and 3D printed mockups to a working and manufacturable prototype. We thoroughly understand each part of Sentien Audio and each design feature was deliberately chosen to provide the best experience. 

 

We are an international team based in Prague, Switzerland, and the US.

Our motto in development: "What is not tested, does not work." - Philipp

 



Story of Sentien 

 

Hello there! 

Peter and I co-founded Sentien in June 2019 to make human-computer communication seamless. Two years prior, I had started research into all-day interfaces, brain-computer interfaces,  smart glasses, and other similar technology.

The latter two were not yet technologically feasible, so I focused on testing audio solutions and running custom software with current form factors like bone conduction headphones. None were good enough for a seamless communication device you can wear all day and forget about.

All existing solutions came with KO parameters like inadequate microphones, poor ergonomics, and a limited software experience.

Meanwhile, Peter was working for a security hardware company and we met randomly through a hackerspace. He was experimenting with offline AI assistants as well as doing research into brain-computer interfaces for his master's thesis.

We hit it off at our first meeting, and from there everything clicked into place. We rented an office together to have a space to brainstorm, organize hackathons, and theorize about information theory and ethics.

Along the way I met Darek, who was working as a designer of unmanned aircraft and studying industrial design at a university. He was extremely resourceful and we could talk for ages about old Mercedes cars he was fixing and selling.

Off and on, we worked on ergonomics, testing, prototyping the basic shapes for the headset, and went over multitudes of iterations to come up with the most ergonomic shape.

From 2019 on, we had a good idea about the shape, electronic parts needed, the main use cases, and the software stack needed to create and share the experience with you.

We’ve spent thousands of hours perfecting Sentien Audio’s design, ergonomics, and software. It’s been quite an experience, peppered with a global health pandemic, but here we are, wearing Sentien Audio every day.

We love the idea of crowdfunding and new technologies coming into this world.

In order to decrease the risk for you, we raised funding to cover the initial development and testing costs. Now we've turned to Kickstarter and Indiegogo for the initial launch, and we are happy to share the Sentien Audio experience with you.

Cheers,

Imrich, co-founder and CEO

PS: If you want to know the details, we wrote a series of blogs on the Story of Sentien.

PS 2: Sometimes we organize hackathons to test out new ideas. We call these Sentien Experiments - our favorite so far is Sentien Launcher for Android.

 

 

 

 

We’re happy to answer any questions you have about the experience of using Sentien Audio, but we know it’s not the same as trying it yourself before you pledge. To show our appreciation for your support, we’re offering you a 14-day money-back guarantee, no questions asked, starting from the day you receive your Sentien Audio.

 

 

All pre-orders via Indiegogo will be shipped worldwide in December 2021. Shipping will be charged closer to the shipping date via our pledge manager.  The current pandemic has made the shipping prices go up. We estimate there will be lower shipping prices due to restrictions easing in Summer 2021, savings on costs for you.

Using the pledge manager, you will also be able to confirm your address and rewards before shipping.

story:
Enjoying music is one of the best feelings in the world, but what if we can make it even more special?

The Splash Bluetooth Speaker not only allows you to listen to music through high quality sound, it allows you to totally immerse yourself and enjoy it visually too!

If you’re looking to really get the party started, or to create the ‘Wow’ factor while entertaining guests at home – The Splash Bluetooth Speaker is perfect for creating a fun vibe on any occasion.

 

The Splash Bluetooth Speaker has a built-in LED light fountain feature which is driven by a pulse-reactive motor, when connected to your sound source. The motor spins to the beat of the music, while the 7-colour LED lights dance around the inside of the speaker, creating a spectacular ‘fountain’ visual display in time with the tune. If you want to take your musical experience to the next level – The Splash Bluetooth Speaker is exactly what you need!

 

Boasting dual soundtracks, The Splash Bluetooth Speaker brings a new dimension to enjoying music and is able to fill an entire room with crystal clear stereo surround sound. Unlike regular Hi-Fi speakers, Splash becomes the party centrepiece with the powerful woofer creating high quality audio and visual enjoyment!

 

Connect Splash to any device by BT/AUX and enjoy high-quality sound and spectacular fountain show!

 

CONTACT US for even more discounts and to learn more about Splash today.

story:
Following on the heels of our previous crowdfunding campaign, we've worked tirelessly to turn our users' feedback into an innovative reality -- meet the SingMic!

 

Packed with highly functional tech capabilities, and combining an exceptional audio output with compact, eye-catching aesthetics, the SingMic is ready to become your on-the-go companion for capturing the most exciting sounds from your daily life.

SingMic isn't just a Bluetooth microphone. It takes all the features of a professional microphone and combines them together into one powerful, versatile solution to get the most out of your inspiration.

 

 

 
 

 

Post-editing is time-consuming and can be a pain even for the most seasoned content creators. That issue is now solved with SingMic! SingMic allows you to capture music directly from the apps and mix it into your video while you're recording it, all in real-time!

 

Be the star of your show! It'll take you just a simple tap on your phone to remove the vocals from your favorite song and sing it all in one go!

 

With a surprisingly low latency of 40ms, every note, word, or sound of your voice will seamlessly sync with your lip movements in ultra-clarity, so your audience won't miss a beat of your streaming performance.

Perfection starts with doing things right from the beginning! SingMic is the first microphone that will allow you to monitor your audio content in real-time while recording, giving you full control of your voice output for professional, error-free audio recording and streaming.

With superb sound quality of up to 48 kHz (in-app use), and up to 30 hours of battery life, SingMic helps you to share your life in every way, at every dynamic moment.

 

SingMic offers fast and easy ways to connect your mobile device. For those who need a wireless connection for enhanced recording flexibility, SingMic lets you link in seconds via Bluetooth. You can also connect SingMic with a 3.5mm cable to your phone to ensure an ultra-stable audio transmission.

Need to do live broadcasting on the go? That’s easy too! Just connect your SingMic to Sabinetek SmartMike+ and combine the seamless performance of your live recording with the seamless convenience of a wireless device!

 

Get ready to podcast your ideas in crisp, clear audio and invite your friends to join in on the action! Connect two SingMics to one phone (or to one DSLR camera) and engage your audience in the most compelling content they've ever listened to.

 

The perfect combination of high-performance hardware with the multi-functional SabineNet* app, SingMic is ready to bring you the results of a professional audio console into a compact and truly versatile solution.

Enhance the sound of your voice by choosing from four reverb levels, letting you achieve highly immersive, studio-quality audio output and a spatial sound effect.

The app is also integrated with a 6-voice changer and a voice recognition algorithm that can automatically transcribe your voice into over 120 languages with just one tap in the app -- full control at your fingertips!

 

SingMic features a highly flexible cardioid model that picks up your voice in a variety of lifestyle environments, and directs it to the audience, ensuring vlogs and interviews sound as clear and crisp as ever in any condition.

 

SingMic’s iconic design is available in three gorgeous colors: black, white, and yellow. Metal matt finished and skilfully designed into a slim, edgeless shell that comfortably fits in the palm of your hand or clips to your collar, SingMic is as just portable as you need it to be.

Press the front button and the LED lighting effects will dynamically sync with the rhythm of your speaking, giving you an effortless additional layer of creativity.

 

Over the past years, we've been working with different content creators in the surf and we're glad to see how much Sabinetek's products are loved by many for increasing productivity!

 

 

We've already started SingMic trial production. All we need now is your support and funding to get the SIngMic to mass production!

 

 

 

We appreciate all those who have supported SingMic and scrolled this far down on our page, and we’d like to give back! Join our Referral Program and share the news of SingMic with your family and friends for exclusive 10% cashback from Sabinetek!

 

 

Started in 2013, Sabinetek has invented products that helped create a world where the most memorable moments are captured – a world where nothing precious goes unheard, and where people feel empowered to fall in love with sound. We create with an out-of-the-box mindset. Our audio products are ultra-compact, stylish, and include a powerful proprietary mixing engine.

Based on the unique features and patented wireless transmission protocol developed by Sabine's R&D team, our products have been widely popularized and awarded by our beloved supporters around the globe.

In 2021, we want to introduce something extraordinary and an entirely different way to create and capture content. Our extensive experience integrating advanced hardware into ultra-compact designs led us to SingMic, the smallest Bluetooth microphone the market has ever seen which also outperforms all of our competitors in the audio industry.

 

 

Contact us to share your experience with SingMic or if you'd like to know more about our mission or our products.

story:
Sound waves cause physical vibrations which travel through the air which brings about different sounds but there are certain situations where this is amplified. Imagine you are at a concert and the deep heavy bass drops or you are at the cinema and an explosion happens, you not only hear the bass, you feel it as well. That’s because your body feels the physical sound waves resonating through the air and also your body and the seat in the cinema.

 

From gaming to watching your favorite movies or TV shows, everything is moving towards mobile platforms and mobile devices such as your smartphone or tablet.  We have developed a pair of in-ear headphones that can give you a fully IMMERSIVE experience while maintaining PORTABILITY for the new modern mobile world. 

 

Available in both WIRED and WIRELESS, we wanted to create something that is affordable, lightweight, free from fuss, and something you can carry in your pocket or bag just like your mobile device. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Decibell vibrating in-ear headphones are designed with a unique 10mm vibration unit when low frequencies occur so you can hear and feel the sound. Each side has a conventional dynamic moving-coil 10mm driver and a 10mm vibration module. The mid to high tones are transmitted through the conventional dynamic driver and the lower bass tones are transmitted through the 10mm vibration module. 

 

 

There are similar headphones with similar technology but it is usually a large and more cumbersome headphone that is not portable or lightweight. With our engineering and design, we have come up with something small that still packs a punch and delivers audible vibration at a specific frequency range. 

 

 

 

  • Frequency response for dynamic driver: 20-20,000Hz   
  • Frequency response for vibration module: 100-350Hz  

 

 

 

 

Recreate your favorite live concert or experience and feel your music in a completely new and exciting way.       

 

Experience a movie theater experience that you can fit in the palm of your hand. Have any rumble or explosion resonate through the Decibell in-ear headphone to have that truly immersive experience.

 

Portable mobile gaming is on the rise and the Decibell vibrating in-ear headphones will match the need for a portable audio experience. It will help with spatial accuracy from things that are happening from left to right and create a more immersive experience.

 

As an ADD-ON we have provided a USB-C and USB-A dongle for backers of the Decibell Kinetic One WIRELESS . Backers can connect the Decibell Kinetic One with their Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and laptop devices with USB-C or USB-A ports.

 

 

Virtual reality is the new fully immersive experience. What better way to improve the experience by having Decibell’s vibrating in-ear headphones. And with virtual reality going towards portability and mobility so too must the audio experience that accompanies it.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Decibell Kinetic in-ear headphones with in-line microphone      
  • Small, medium, large silicone ear tips
  • Small, medium, large memory foam tips
  • Special ear "fins" for an even more secure fit
  • Soft pouch for portability and protection
  • Clip (for Wired version)
  • USB charging cable (for Wireless version)
  • Instructions guide (for Wireless version)

 

 

 

We at Decibell did not spare any expense during the development process. The casing is machined from metallic alloy for durability. Wiring and cables are tested for reliability and all parts are tested rigorously to provide the aesthetic and functional quality that we can be proud of. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

At Decibell we are a motivated and dynamic group of people. The core group of people:      

 

Nelson has over 12 years of experience in the development of consumer electronics and meeting major milestones for production and development. Nelson has worked with some of the biggest named audio brands in the world.

 

Eric has over 12 years of experience in creative design, branding, and marketing and has won awards and accolades for his work with his clients. 

 

For any inquiries please email us at hello@decibell.me

 

 

We want to bring a product, which changes the mobile audio landscape. We want to create and improve the consumer experience in an area where the industry is saturated with the same products. We believe creating an exciting immersive product for the modern mobile world will help improve the experience of the users. Your pledges will help us pay for tooling, sample development, and production. We deeply appreciate your help and hope you can also enjoy audio that is more immersive and that you can feel. You can also help us by spreading the word.

 

 

We appreciate all of your help and support. Even if you can’t make a contribution you can still help! You can help by liking and subscribing to our Facebook page, and follow us on Instagram. You can also help spread the word to your family and friends! Share the Kickstarter page.

 

 

 
 

 

For shipments outside the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, and European Union there may be delays or additional duties, fees, or taxes covered at your expense. If for whatever reason the order is cancelled we will refund your pledge.  Like any project, there may be some unforeseen events or delays from development to large-scale manufacturing that can affect the schedule for delivery. However, our team has years of experience in meeting developmental milestones and has excellent manufacturing partners to help reduce any risks and delays.

We appreciate all of your help and support. Even if you can’t make a contribution you can still help! You can help by liking and subscribing to our Facebook page, and follow us on Instagram. You can also help spread the word to your family and friends! Share the Kickstarter page.
 

 

   For shipments outside the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, and European Union there may be delays or additional duties, fees, or taxes covered at your expense. If for whatever reason the order is cancelled we will refund your pledge.  Like any project, there may be some unforeseen events or delays from development to large-scale manufacturing that can affect the schedule for delivery. However, our team has years of experience in meeting developmental milestones and has excellent manufacturing partners to help reduce any risks and delays.

story:
We’re two musicians who appreciate good sound and, you guessed it, the 80s.

There’s nothing better than kickin’ back with a John Hughes flick or dancing with your friends to Dexys Midnight Runners. The 80s were a bold, colorful and lively decade and we wanted to introduce a bit of that nostalgia into today’s world.

So we combined two of the things we love most to create pl8ty- a product that goes back to the future. We hope you’re as excited about this retro design as we are.

The 80s were a bold, colorful and lively decade and we wanted to introduce a bit of that nostalgia into today’s world.So we combined two of the things we love most to create pl8ty- a product that goes back to the future. We hope you’re as excited about this retro design as we are.

story:
We are Shipping!!!!

 

The Enigma

We bring you a Bluetooth speaker that is a cross breed of Thai artistry, Scandinavian and German audio engineering and the latest advancement in digital signal processing and electronic design. The speaker is designed and manufactured in Singapore.

What matters most in high fidelity (Hifi) music reproduction?

I have been building amplifiers and speakers for the last 35 years. Being a maverick DIY enthusiast allows me to test every conceivable approach out there and to see things for what they really are. Having a PhD in Engineering allows me to understand all the technical jargons and papers and correlate it with my own physical experience. Through it all, I learned what is really important and what is pure bullshit marketing crap.  Visiting all the hifi shows just proves the point, it is not always the most expensive set that sounds the best. Just like the secret of cooking meat is actually sous-vide, the secret to Hifi sound is not what it seems. My fellow Hifi enthusiasts could not believe that such a small and cheap system like Enigma could sound better than a $2000 floorstander system. If you are in Singapore and interested in a Demo, click on the "Ask a question" next to the video. If you are not in Singapore and you have something you would like to find out about, click on the link, I will get back to you. 

The Speaker Driver

The speaker drivers is the crucial component of the system that transform the electrical signals into mechanical motion creating sound waves. The speaker  driver is responsible for 80% of the sound quality that we hear. Designing high quality speaker drivers is a black art known only to a few and is a mixture of material science, optimization of the motor structure and balancing the various parts of the driver to achieve the most precise reproduction of sound. It is impossible to tell visually from normal drivers, but a well designed speaker has a captivating effect and once experienced  makes it very hard to go back. What people don't know is the speaker driver in a $100,000 speaker system is only $200 more than a $300 speaker system, and the speaker driver of your $500 sound bar is only $5. Our speaker drivers costs us a lot of money but it is worth it.

Main Driver

The main speaker driver is 4" high excursion full range driver. SB Acoustics drivers are designed by industry veterans Ulrik Schmidt and Frank Neilsen and are frequently used by some of the top Hifi speaker manufacturers in the world, mostly in the 4 to 6 digit price range. These include Steinway Lyngdorf, Wilson Audio and Buchardt Audio.  It is widely known in the Hifi circles that the best speaker drivers are quite often from Scandinavian region.

Rear Tweeters

One of the biggest influence to live like sound is actually a rear tweeter. Typically only found in very expensive speakers, the importance of it is actually quite often overlooked. Our Visaton ambient tweeter's purpose is to simulate the natural sounds of instruments. Real instruments emits sound in all directions as opposed to speakers which emit only in the front. Our brain perceives this as something amiss. In the extreme case as in the case of earphones, the sound will appear as if it originates from inside your head. The reflections from the wall evenly distributes the sound and resulting in an airy, live and open soundstage in your living room.

The Monocoque Spherical Speaker Cabinet

The 1/2”(12mm) monocoque design is carved from a single piece of wood serves as a pressure vessel (such as gas cylinders) ensuring maximum rigidity and minimal amount of unwanted vibration. The spherical shape also ensures sound wave is distributed evenly in all directions.  They are much harder to make compared to rectangular boxes and typically only found in upmarket Hifi speakers. Our situation is rather unusual as our suppliers normal products are vases....

Speakers + Digital Signal Processing (DSP)

Designing sound system as a whole instead of separately allows it be much more than the sum of it is parts. Our speakers are tuned and optimized differently knowing that there will DSP corrections later, resulting in much deeper bass than previously achieved by conventional means. All our speakers are assembled, individually measured and optimized in Singapore before shipping out to you. This results in a system with an incredibly flat frequency response for truly accurate music reproduction.

50 watt/channel amplifier

All the electronics are integrated within a single board providing both bluetooth 4.2 Apt-X and auxiliary input. The board features a 50 watt/channel class D amplifier ensuring both clarity and deep thunderous bass. We have opted to use a readily available Bluetooth DSP amplifier board with proven track record to ensure timely delivery to our backers. What matters are the DSP programming to match our speakers. The boards are designed to be easily replaceable due to eventual aging. 

Stereo and Mono

Our speaker is available in both mono and stereo. Music is recorded in stereo, one for the left channel and one for the right, one for each ear. Mono is your typical bluetooth speaker where the both left and right channel is combined to playback from one speaker. Stereo is the sound being played separately over 2 speakers. One for each ear. If they are placed together in the same box you won’t have the stereo effect. This is typical of how a hifi system is set up. They would need to be separated at least a few feet apart to achieve the true effect. Our stereo unit comprise of one active unit and one passive unit with a 4 metre (13 feet) of interconnecting speaker cable (provided).

Design and Finishing

Each individual speaker is hand carved by master artisans in Thailand on a wooden lathe. Each individual piece is unique and represents the very best that Thai artistry has to offer. There is a total of 8 different finishes to choose from. We have one for you no matter your interior decor.

Eco Friendly Product

The chassis of the speaker is made from mangowood, an upcycled waste product from the mango plantation industry. The trees are renewed every 15 to 20 years to optimize on fruit bearing as the tree ages. The wood is soft and would have been discarded if not utilized for decorative furniture such as vases. 

The 4th R – Repair

Ever have nightmares of you broken electronics ending up in the landfill after a few years of usage because it was too expensive to fix? Everybody has hear of the 3R- Reduce, reuse, recycle …. But the 4th is not so prevalent nowadays compared to 30 years ago…. Repair. Our speakers are designed to be easily repaired. If you are handy with a screwdriver, we can ship you a new board with the preset settings of your speaker and you could replace it yourself. The electronics are all low voltage and pose no danger to you. Just unscrew a few terminals and replace it with a new board.

Personalization

We will personalize the name of the Bluetooth speaker to your choice. This is the name you will see as you are trying to connect to your speaker. Just click on the "äsk a question" next to the video and drop us a note on the name you would like.

TVs and PCs

Having a bluetooth input means these speakers can now link directly to many modern day TVs and Laptops/ PCs for immersive home theatre and gaming. Connect to the speaker and you will enjoy direct digital linkage from your DVD, Blu-ray, cable TV, laptop, PC to your speaker. TV inputs will automatically switch to the right input, so you don't have to worry about an extra switching and wiring that you have to do with a Audio Video Receiver (AVR). With our generous low end bass output, you won't really miss the subwoofer. Since the speaker and amplifier are designed to match each other via DSP, you don't even have to worry you might accidentally "blow" your speakers when somebody fires the cannon.... 

Manufacturing

The speakers are assembled in Singapore with the parts from all over the world, the wooden spheres from Thailand, the speaker drivers from Indonesia and Germany and the electronics from China. By utilising this approach, we are not burdened by tooling cost for mould (they are very expensive) as well as the cost to run production for a minimum of 10000 units or more. That is why we could go for such a low minimum funding cost. However the spheres takes 3 months to cut, dry and finish. We have pre-ordered 100pcs of spheres and just waiting for them to be shipped over, so if all goes well we can start shipping our first batch a few weeks after our campaign closes in April.

Why do we want your support?

More than just helping us fund our first full production run, what we really want is your feedback. Tell us what you like or don’t like about our product and how we can improve. Tell us what you think about everything from the way the speaker sounds, to the shape and the finish of the speakers. There is still opportunity for change before we go into full production.

My journey in audio

I loved music from an early age listening to my dad’s old car stereo. It is true what people say, music moves the soul. I first listened to cassette on cheap Japanese mass produced system in the 1970s. When I heard a true hifi system for the first time, I was floored. I built my first amplifier when I was 14 and it has been my hobby for the last 35 years. Back in those days, it was impossible to DIY anything closely resembling the performance of a commercial Hifi system. All that changed about 10 years ago – it can be described in one word – the Internet. The internet means it is now possible to buy high quality speaker drivers, exchange notes through forums and accurately model the performance your loudspeakers before building it. As I was trained both as a physicist and electronic engineer, I am comfortable tweaking the entire signal chain from the signal source to the speakers. I also realized how much there is to gain if you were to design the system as a whole allowing the different part of the signal chain (DSP, amplifier, speaker drivers and cabinets) to collaborate resulting in higher performance, more compact size and lower cost. If you want to understand what does that mean, could you imagine your handphone sounding this loud and clear 20 years ago? It basically threw out what I perceive Hifi should look like, big ugly clunky speakers with expensive components etc. Enigma is the result of this paradigm shift.

The Team

Oon Chin Hin (Left, Founder) received his PhD in Nanotechnology from the National University of Singapore back in 2003 and has worked in R&D in everything from semiconductor manufacturing to LEDs to solar cells. He is a scientist by day but comes sundown he becomes a DIY audiophile maverick constructer. Stanley Tay (Right, Co-Founder) was an accountant before he realized it is not a fun profession if you are a techie. He now runs his own company in lighting and constantly looking out for the next cool thing to check out. We both feel nothing beats the real world experience, whether listening to music that will bring you to euphoria or being in a beautiful place in a beautiful time surrounded by mesmerizing fairy lights. Hence our venture in Enigma…

story:
We are Freedrum.

Freedrum is the best way to play the drums anytime, anywhere. Whether you are an aspiring drummer, a professional, or just want to jam with your friends. Freedrum is the instrument for you.

Freedrum has a growing community of over 14,000 passionate musicians that the love of music and technology has brought together.

Now we are back again to introduce our next generation of Freedrum: Freedrum 2

 

 

 

Need assets for press or social media? Here is the PRESS KIT LINK.

 

 

We want to make the most affordable way to learn and play the drums.

Our new instrument gives you an authentic drumming experience! Freedrum is the most portable, flexible, and accessible drumming product on the market. With Freedrum 2 we are introducing additional new features such as haptic feedback, customizations of grip styles and drum kits, our users will get the best virtual drumming experience.

 


Freedrum wants to make drumming accessible for all. With our new software service, we are giving you everything you need in order to learn how to play the drums anytime, anywhere. No matter if you are a beginner or a pro, you can never stop learning.

This tightly integrated relationship between instrument and app will transform how you practice and give you deeper insights into your improvements.

 

We want to make learning more fun! Our app will give you suggestions on what you should play next and offer you a platform to share your creations with your friends.

 

TRACK, PLAY, RECORD

 

 

 

COMMUNITY

Why keep your skills to yourself? Share it with the community! Hit record and the app will capture a video with your drumming so that you can easily share your music with the community.

 

 

 

OUTPUT & RE-MAP MIDI TO ANY DAW

 

 

Once you’re ready to take your drumming into production, output MIDI from our app to your favourite Digital Audio Workstation such as GarageBand, Ableton, and Pro Tools. You’ll be able to remap the MIDI any way that you see fit.

 

 

 

 

NEVER STOP LEARNING


Even the pros never stop learning. Our service will grow with your confidence level and keep challenging you to be better. We'll recommend exercises that encourage improvement and retention of learned skills.

HAPTIC FEEDBACK

 

 

Nothing is going to replace the feeling of playing behind an acoustic drum kit but our new virtual drum kit will bring you closer. Haptic feedback (similar to what you feel with a game console controller) creates a unique sensation based on which drum you hit and how hard. We’ve done this by recreating the vibrations you feel when playing an acoustic kit.

HEEL UP

 

 

One of the most requested features from our customers is the ability to play the bass pedal with your heel up: increasing your speed and comfort. This will work for single bass, double bass, and the hi-hat.

CUSTOM GRIP STYLES

 

In our app you will be able to select your preferred drumstick grip style for both left and right-handed playing: intelligently re-calibrating the drumstick sensors to meet the ergonomic grip of your choice.

 

 

 

It's our mission to make Freedrum compatible with as many devices as possible. As our name suggests, you should be free to use our product in a way that suits you best. 

Freedrum 2 is compatible with:

  • iOS
  • macOS
  • iPadOS
  • Android
  • Windows

Since Freedrum is using interactive audio, Bluetooth headphones and speakers have an inherent latency that makes it difficult to play. Please refer to our FAQ page for more information.

 

 

 

 

Thanks to you, the community, our first virtual drum kit reached over 400% of the Kickstarter goal and we delivered our rewards, on time, 9 months later. Since 2017 we've shipped 15 000 units globally and we've listened to all of your feedback. We're back, four years later to ask for your help once more. Pledge to our project today and help us create the future of drumming for all.

 

OUR TEAM

story:
[日本語訳リンク @ peblwear.com]

 

The Problem

Good music have always empowered my life.
And the music apps helped expand the music experience.

However the problem exists, in many of an active occasion.

And a suitable option to solve the problem, doesn't exist.

 

The Problem #1 | Hassle


What was the volume up command??

We know the Apple Music, Spotify, Amazon music track curation are not always perfect. And we don’t always grab the phone. Siri doesn't exactly do what we want. Earbuds remotes has its own language.

 

The Problem #2 | Unsafe


Touch buttons are too small to tap while moving. Look ahead !!

 

 

 

What if we can listen to the best track in right volume, 
in the right moment?

↓

The Solution

 

Swipe. Slide. Hold.

Three simple gestures, carefully placed on palm size curved surface, directly responds to your fingertips.

Works directly, or through your pocket of favorite jeans, workout pants, cyclewear or backpack.

 

 

PEBLWEAR | Technology

Design is based on prototyping and everyday field test, every knowledge being in nature and the human interface design, are applied into this product.

Combining the industry standard wireless technology, and durable and reliable design, PEBLWEAR is designed to enjoy its experience as long as we want.

 

  1. Patent pending Tangible Touch technology 

    Pebble sized curved touch surface brings the one and only tangible control at your fingertips. You can feel the gestures by your hand, and through your pocket, so you don’t need to look at [ Patent Pending ]. The size, thickness, curves, material texture, are all precisely engineered for easy control in active occasion. And it is already in the cycle of design optimization in my everyday life. 

     

  2. Simple gestures by captive touch sensor
    Swipe. Slide. Hold. Directly reads your fingertips, and sends out the sound controls just after the gesture recognition. PEBLWEAR have placed the same technology as touchscreen on smartphones under the pebble sized curved touch surface. It is designed to work through textiles which is not too thick (Intelligent algorithm automatically calibrates when touch surface has stable contact to the textile ) . Jeans, workout pants, thin gloves and backpacks are tested.

     

  3. Wireless, low energy, and long lasting design 

    Connects with industry standard wireless technology "Bluetooth-HID". Ultra low energy design realizes the several month battery life, and the battery is swappable. Durable and minimal structure realized by 3D formed plastic. Water, shock and dust resistant.



     

  4. PEBLWEAR App to tailor your experience 

    The optional PEBLWEAR app, makes the experience much easy and tailored to your needs. Future updates and additional features planned to be provided through the app.

 

 

PEBLWEAR | Experience

Based on everyday life with music and activity in nature. From 2019, proof of concept prototype have been continuously tested in the field, to make sure the one and only, exceptional sound control experience.

 

Make your favorite jeans pocket into smartwear.

Find the best position for your trip with good music.

 

 

Prototype | Hands on videos

 

PEBLWEAR | Tech specs

 

Other devices vs PEBLWEAR

 

PEBLWEAR | Feedbacks

 

 

PEBLWEAR | Vision

I believe in the power of music.

I believe in the power of natural user interface.

Music makes us move, relax, inspire, and empower.

What if we can listen to the best track in right volume, in the right moment?

Hoping life would be a bit better with a little help of everyday music control.

The power of music. Photograph @ Fuji Rock Festival 2011

 

 

PEBLWEAR | Message

To bring this unique idea to every music lovers daily life, I would like to ask the worlds most innovative backers and crowdfunding platform to support the launch of this product.

Looking for your support to …

  • Bring this niche but empowering experience to the market, and into your hand !
  • Bring unique music listening experience to every music lovers daily life!

 

Thanks to your support, after the project successfully launched, PEBLWEAR will be available in wider availability, from peblwear.com and local shops, and you’ll be able to purchase another pair for you, or recommend to your friend and say you Kickstarted the original.

 

 

PEBLWEAR | Development

PEBLWEAR is created from the core insights of the user interface design and engineering experiences.

Design, Prototype, Build, Test, Repeat...

Every knowledge being in nature and the human interface design, are applied into this product. While worked as a UI engineer, we needed to create a new, simple way to add skill to the PC interface. We tried many ideas and came to the final answer to use tangible touch gesture. After few years, this idea also tested as a sound control for automotive. And now, it's for PEBLWEAR.


 

Built | Earth friendly

to keep the nature of local forests and the earth. (Photograph @Norikura, Nagano, Japan)

  • Original micro manufacturing process for production assembly to ensure the reliable care of what we produce.
  • Our facility is powered by 100% solar energy for assembly to packing, thanks to the most sunny area in Japan.
  • Structure part is also designed to be low environmental impact. We choose Jet fusion 3D printing, no solvent ink printing, which is hugly earth friendly than traditional and major manufacturing technology. 
  • Packing will be minimal, to reduce material we use, and to reduce logistics impact.

 

Production planed at earth friendly solar powered micro factory

From design to build, and ship. Japan made.

 

 

PEBLWEAR | Timeline

 

 

PEBLWEAR | Creator

Yuhei Akatsuka

Career in digital device manufacturer based in Japan from 2002. Experience in product engineering, to product planning, strategy, and new project development. Strength in user interface design and engineering.

Inspired from passed works related to touch interface and sound solution development at SONY, I have started to experiment this original project from 2018, looking for the new possibility of music experience, which is my daily excitement. And now, looking for initial support to launch it as a product.

Personally fell in love with mountain biking and snowboarding, resulted moving from Tokyo to Nagano, where 1997 winter olympic have held. Enjoying stunning nature and activity’s.

Love music, listening 365 days per year. No music, No life.

 

 

Contact

  • Official web site : peblwear.com

 

Featured on

  •  The ultimate tech and gadget Father’s Day gift guide with all the best ideas from 2021 
  •  PEBLWEAR wireless music remote : Rating 9.3/10 "excellent" 

 

 

Updates from latest project

  • Project finally funded on August 2021
  • Now on pre-order and production engineering phase

 

 

Follow for the updates

  • Facebook: @peblwear 
  • Instagram: @peblwear 

Even if you can’t support us by backing this project, it would be a huge help by sharing PEBLWEAR on your network. Help us spread the word!

 

 

Special thanks

To Morikawa-family, Miyuki, Adam, J, Blackbird, and all backers, all around the world from USA to Europe and Japan, expressed a support for the past projects. 2021 Summer, we have reached the funding goal, gave me a lot of energy to move on to this project.

 

 

Risks and challenges

Challenges 
Base on the passed developments, my challenge is to provide best experience by this product, at the time of product launch. This challenge is incredibly hard for an individual person who do not have a power like big companies. The funding goes to the product fullfilment and for investments developing the product.  I have confidence to bring PEBLWEAR to the market through this project, by your support and on my full utilization of 19 years experience in digital product manufacture from product engineering, planning to project lead and management. 

Production and communication
Possibility of certain processes including manufacturing and testing may be unexpectedly delayed. If this does occur, we ask for your patience and understanding while our team works hard to overcome any and all obstacles. We promise to always keep our backers in the loop, no matter what happens, good or bad. Each time we make progress, or when we are not making progress, we will update you on our project status. Let’s build a great product together!

Notes  

  • Please be noted that all of the product design and specification are not finalized, and there will be some modification at shipment timing.  
  • Shipping limited to Japan, USA, and Europe at this moment, to simplify the component and international import regulation. 
  • The shipping rate to your country will be indicated in the check-out menu when making a pledge for this campaign. Please note that the price of the item does not include additional duty and taxes that may apply as per local laws of importation.  
  • Return policy: The funds go towards initiating production and launching of the product, resulting in a product that the backer can enjoy. In accordance with Kickstarter Terms of Use, will not offer refunds or return for items that are not defective. However, in the event that you receive a faulty item, you are welcome to contact us for replacement.
story_txt:
[日本語訳リンク @ peblwear.com] The ProblemGood music have always empowered my life.And the music apps helped expand the music experience.However the problem exists, in many of an active occasion.And a suitable option to solve the problem, doesn't exist. The Problem #1 | HassleWhat was the volume up command??We know the Apple Music, Spotify, Amazon music track curation are not always perfect. And we don’t always grab the phone. Siri doesn't exactly do what we want. Earbuds remotes has its own language. The Problem #2 | UnsafeTouch buttons are too small to tap while moving. Look ahead !!   What if we can listen to the best track in right volume, in the right moment?↓The Solution Swipe. Slide. Hold.Three simple gestures, carefully placed on palm size curved surface, directly responds to your fingertips.Works directly, or through your pocket of favorite jeans, workout pants, cyclewear or backpack.  
PEBLWEAR | TechnologyDesign is based on prototyping and everyday field test, every knowledge being in nature and the human interface design, are applied into this product.Combining the industry standard wireless technology, and durable and reliable design, PEBLWEAR is designed to enjoy its experience as long as we want. 

Patent pending Tangible Touch technology 
Pebble sized curved touch surface brings the one and only tangible control at your fingertips. You can feel the gestures by your hand, and through your pocket, so you don’t need to look at [ Patent Pending ]. The size, thickness, curves, material texture, are all precisely engineered for easy control in active occasion. And it is already in the cycle of design optimization in my everyday life.  


Simple gestures by captive touch sensorSwipe. Slide. Hold. Directly reads your fingertips, and sends out the sound controls just after the gesture recognition. PEBLWEAR have placed the same technology as touchscreen on smartphones under the pebble sized curved touch surface. It is designed to work through textiles which is not too thick (Intelligent algorithm automatically calibrates when touch surface has stable contact to the textile ) . Jeans, workout pants, thin gloves and backpacks are tested.

 


Wireless, low energy, and long lasting design 
Connects with industry standard wireless technology "Bluetooth-HID". Ultra low energy design realizes the several month battery life, and the battery is swappable. Durable and minimal structure realized by 3D formed plastic. Water, shock and dust resistant.

story:
Update! October 2020

We are finalizing our manufacturing and are preparing ship our Pearl Earbuds to backers with our first batch starting in November 2020. We will update our website, www.pearlbuds.com with more details on this in the coming weeks! Thank you for your patience!
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

____________________________________________________________________

 

 

____________________________________________________________________

 

 

 

 

Our Story

 

Inspired by Crystal Li's original design exhibition at CES 2017, Lucas and Ethan Chang recruited a team of passionate audio engineers to create a groundbreaking new audio brand. Pearl's team is comprised of industry leading acoustic engineers, product designers, electrical/mechanical engineers, and production quality control managers with unrivaled experience in the audio space. Our team hails from organizations and institutions such as Panasonic, PininFarina, HALEAD, MIT, Stanford, Columbia, and UCLA. 

Our team is California partners with Weide Electronics, a leading audio R&D and production manufacturer in Shenzhen, China. Unlike many consumer electronics brands, our two teams work as one to ensure efficient R&D and rigorous quality control standards. 

Designed in Beverly Hills, California, and produced with rigorous quality control in Shenzhen. Our team is dedicated to quality control and engaging customer service. We believe in creating and maintaining a premium brand, and nothing is more important to us than our first customers on Indiegogo.

Pearl audio is here to deliver Premium Sound, Advanced Features, and Exotic Design. 

 

Initial Concepts and Designs

Partnering with Weide Electronics to create prototypes

Injection Molding and Internal Electronic Design

\

Assembly and Quality Control

 

Production Ready

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Guaranteed Fulfillment

Our team is dedicated to the highest quality of product and customer service. We aim to be a premium brand in the audio industry and will prioritize Indiegogo backers as our first customers. Delivery is guaranteed with a one year warranty. If there are any issues or questions that you have about Pearl Audio or our products, simply reach out via email or Facebook. 

Satisfaction guaranteed - Return within 14 days for a 100% refund.

story:
And we dig quality sound.

We’re veterans of the sound world. We’ve been creating the components of great speakers for big companies for more than 20 years. And for more than 20 years, we’ve been wondering why all these great speakers are so damn expensive. So because we know exactly what it takes to create a super-quality speaker, we set out on a mission to get quality sound into everyone's hands.

We decided to create our own incredible loudspeakers, and we knew that in order to make them affordable, we’d have to think outside the box, or, more appropriately, flatten the box. And that’s exactly what we did.

After a few prototypes and trial runs, we’re excited to finally be able to introduce you to REAXT.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Tross is a data driven Crowdfunding company

story:
The sound of traditional speakers is limited, other speakers are mostly inconvenient to carry, too heavy, the sound is not rich enough. But Blade can solve this problem well. It is very light and easy to carry. You can put it in your pocket and take it to any party. You can be the focus while hosting a party anywhere.

 Start a band all by yourself​

Travel with the Music​

story:
Senspad is the first wireless and scalable connected drumpad.

Connected to our application you can:

  • Practice and follow your progression on the pad.

  • Create your own portable drumkit to play everywhere by adding multiple pads
  • Record and share your sessions
  • And of course, enjoy all the traditional features of the high-end electronic drum modules for free into your Smartphone!

Since the beginning of electronic drums in 1980s, the traditional well-known brands cover, with an exclusive monopoly the whole market. A significant domination, but at the same time without any other remarkable innovation for about 30 years now in electronic drums. We are all here to change that. Senspad is :

  • Less expensive than the whole existing professional system
  • Offer the same quality of professional systems
  • More evolutive and scalable (add many Senspad to create your own drumkit)
  • Fully transportable
  • Connected
  • Wireless

Cherry on top, you will be able to upgrade your system for FREE , no need to buy another pads or a new drum module, just click on Update directly into our app.

Senspad is UNIQUE and will change things for years.

1# Beginners, drummers…

Are you on your way to a lesson? Or late at school and don’t want to wake anyone up? Take your Senspad and practice your rudiments!

2# Already got a drum kit?

Insulate it and transform it in a connected drum in few seconds or add easily new sounds at the lowest costs

3# Musician?

Create your own rhythms very easily with your fingertips!

With Senspad you are finally able to experience anywhere, anyhow and without any constraints real drumming sensations.

Say goodbye to wires, plug sockets, expensive drum modules. From now on, with only your phone you are able to directly control/pilot everything and to benefit from frequent and free updates ensuring you even more new features.

Senspad is:

  • Light: less than a 1.5 lbs
  • Precise: Ghost notes management up to the Forte
  • Connected: Play directly wireless to create a complete connected drumkit
  • Customizable: assign up to 3 areas of strikes
  • Adjustable: combine several Senspad together to create a complete connected drumkit
  • Open: compatible with any digital audio workstation/music software for Windows, Mac, Iphone, Android devices accepting midi signals
  • Hybrid: You want to connect Senspad via USB port? Senspad supports it too
  • Interactive: Thanks to our dedicated application, follow your sessions and improvements
  • Simple: A six-year-old child can use it
  • Design: Innovative, unique and ergonomic

Demonstration of the minimalist Drumkit

 

Android users : the latency changes from one phone to the other depending on the manufacturers. You can get an idea of the expected latency via Bluetooth here

Computers : Senspad is plug-and-play compatible with computers (Mac, Windows, Linux) with midi USB or midi over Bluetooth.

You just have to use your favorite DAW software to enjoy your pad.

The Redison pro latency adaptor can be connected via a USB-c plug. It is compatible with all Smartphones accepting midi and all computers accepting midi via USB.

Thanks to our adaptor you can cut the latency by 30%

For IOS users, the purchase of an additional camkit will be necessary to connect the adaptor.

1# Practice your technique on the pad

Senspad allows you to improve your dexterity/smoothness, coordination et precision on the pad. With its different areas, you can practice sounds and with the leds follow the rythm, exercices and many more awesome things !

=> The Senspad or the Minimalist Drum Kit are made for you !

 

2# Create a complete portable drumkit

Connect several Senspad, and add Senstroke sensors on your feet to create a genuine portable wireless and connected drumkit.

=> The Drum Kit is made for you

 

3# Transform your acoustic kit

Insulate your acoustic drumkit and transform it into a connected one by putting your pads on top of your acoustic drumkit elements in seconds.

=> The Senspad is made for you !

4#Add new elements to your kit

Put one to several pads around your kit to add new sounds

=> The Senspad is made for you !

 

Note: If you want to work with our low latency System, only one Redison Pro Latency Adaptor is required to connect one to many Senspad.

 

Since one year all of our team members, our designer partners and engineers have the same goal : provide you the best drumming experience ever made.

We are near of the final product, and thanks to our beta tester, we are convinced that Senspad will change the drumming industry forever.

The responsiveness, the rebound, the latency, the soft touch are truly incredibles !

Two years after Senstroke’s success, Senspad is the second product that we launch on the Indiegogo InDemand program.

Your feedbacks, your ideas, will help us offer the best possible product.

The success of this financing campaign will help us finance the future application developments and finish Senspad’s industrialization.

Be the first in the world to take advantage of the drum pad revolution and be an actor of change.

https://www.facebook.com/Redisonofficial/

Enjoy our Presskit directly by click above on the picture !

Contact

Website - Facebook - Twitter - Instagram
