story:
Hello everyone ...

My name is Marsio Salcuni, and I am a lover of Music, Physics and Magnetism, and one day, I got the idea of ​​combining these three things in my own way! And I must admit that it didn't go badly ... That idea gave me the opportunity to build my first X-PICK, and start having fun experimenting and playing. As you can see from the videos, however, I started to understand that it was much more important than just having fun ... I discovered that it is a set of everything a guitarist or bassist should have always with him ... All enclosed in a little Gem!

Like a ... MultiFunction Army Knife ... made especially for Musicians, which combines a multitude of objects, which usually a guitarist buys and uses separately ... In addition to the fact that it gives us the possibility to do many things that could not be done in any other way, if not with the X-Pick ... Like Playing with Magnetic Fields!

I can not wait to see the thousand other facets that All of You are able to discover, moreover because each of you has different instruments, amplifiers, settings ... and being Magnetic Fields, they will always be different, with different results, different sounds, etc ...

Each of you will contribute to the growth of the X-Pick's capabilities, and yours!

Because you will have 1000 more ways to MAKE MUSIC! 

The X-PICK has a size of 24 mm x 25 mm, a thickness of 4 mm and has a well-defined tip, but with a very wide angle (90° in Axial Position), such as to facilitate simple picking or normal fast picking.

The DESIGN, combined with the type of MAGNETIZATION, never creates problems of too much attraction towards the strings ... The maximum magnetic degree, is poured only on the faces of the magnet as Physics teaches us, and strong enough, but calculated, on the back of the X-Pick to use magnetic field modulation techniques! ... It is obvious, for example, that the bass strings suffer more attraction, given their thickness, but this in no way prevents the fast and precise picking, as you have seen from the videos because you can take advantage also of a Magnetic Trick, to improve Normal Picking and Fast Picking: "Exactly at the tip, at the union between the North and South magnetic fields, there is no attraction with the iron strings, but an imperceptible, but decisive repulsive force is felt, which facilitates the Picking, as if the string were thrown".

The reason is that the iron atoms of the string, being close to both polarities almost simultaneously (i.e. picking) do not have time to reorient themselves for the attraction, and combined with the fact that the power of magnetism always focuses on the faces of a magnet, I opted for axial magnetization that collides the opposite magnetic fields, right in the tip, and I created this kind of magnetism game to facilitate and speed up the movement of the pick ...

The rear corners are cut in order to facilitate the use of some particular techniques, and ensure the right degree of magnetism in the interaction between magnetic fields with the Pickups.

It has very smooth lateral surfaces to slide on the strings like a slide would and the back is the one that has the most magnetic degree, because it is the widest, suitable for all the innovative techniques that require magnetic field modulations of the pick-ups of the instruments

 

The direction of magnetization of the pick is AXIAL, in such a way as to adapt to any type of polarity of the pick ups on the market.

The X-Pick is made with material named NEODYMIUM, from the category of Rare Earth Permanent Magnets; is chemically composed with NdFeB (Neodymium-Iron-Boron) and has the highest degree of magnetism that exists: N52. 

It have a Coating named (Ni-Cu-Ni- Epoxy) that is, a Nickel-Copper-Nickel composition and a final layer of Epoxy Resin to give more grip in contact with the fingers, as well as for protection from wear …

 

MAGNETIC FIELDS (with iron powder):

  

"X- PICK"

ALL IN NEODYMIUM N52

THE ONLY MAGNETIC PICK OF ALL TIMES

+

ROUND PLASTIC CASE

TO PROTECT THE X-PICK AND

ALWAYS CARRY IT WITH YOU !!

 

"X- PICK"

ALL IN NEODYMIUM N52

THE ONLY MAGNETIC PICK OF ALL TIMES

+

WOODEN DISPLAY BOX

​TO SHOW IT IN ALL ITS SPLENDOR: 

- AT YOUR HOME, 

- WHERE YOU PLAY WITH YOUR BAND, 

- IN THE SHOWCASE OF YOUR SHOP, 

- OR FOR A PHANTASMAGORIC

 GIFT TO GIVE TO A MUSICIAN !!

 

 

 

IT IS COMPOSED BY:

 

- A WOODEN DIPLAY BOX

- VELVET BEARING

- NON-SLIP MAGNET

WHICH ALLOWS THE X-PICK TO REMAIN

ERECTED FOR EXPOSURE, IN FRONT OF

THE LOGO THAT IS ALSO PRESENT INSIDE ... 

+

    

AND IN ADDITION WITH THE CHOICE "EXPO"

YOU WILL ALSO HAVE THE "TACTICAL" CASE

TO PROTECT THE X-PICK AND TAKE IT WITH YOU

 

 

Describing what happens, when it bring the X-Pick closer and away from the pick up of the instrument, there is a field modulation of the electromagnetic coils, with consequent change of shape, direction and intensity of the magnetic field between the X-Pick and the pick ups, to produce a different sound than usual ...

Using the X-Pick, you can change, IN REAL TIME: THE POSITION, THE SHAPE, THE POWER, THE INTENSITY of the GUITAR/BASS PICKUPS, which will have their fixed magnetic field, modulated by a magnetic brother who moves on them!

AS IF YOU CREATED A DIFFERENT PICKUP FOR EVERY PICK POSITION, ADAPTABLE TO EVERY KIND OF NEED:

 

 

PLECTRUM

New approach in the use of the Pick, with the use of the Magnetic Trick explained above, to improve control and speed up the Pick

​

 

BODY & CRISTALLINITY OF SOUND

Crystallinity and Body of Sound thanks to this innovative material, the Neodymium, which makes it seem to ALWAYS PLAY WITH NEW STRINGS!

 

SLIDE

A Wonderfull Slide, again thanks to Neodymium, which guarantees a Great Sustain! But also under another aspect: Finally you will use the Slide with the right hand in an agile way, leaving the left free to put chords, managing to act even only on the single note !!

 

PICK – TAPPING or "TAPPICK"

The Pick that will allow you to give a brilliant and perfect note just to contact, without having to press the string on the fret like a Viking, like with normal picks! In fact, it makes the notes shine even where there is no guitar fretboard, so much that you will use it for magnificent and wild tapping, where no one has gone before!

 

BRUSHES EFFECT

Sound produced only by the magnetic fields, bringing the pick closer to the Pick Up, and making them pass the strings, one by one or all together to create the rolls

 

MAGNETIC FIELDS DELAY

Delay of any kind of sound you want; Just one touch on the note or chords, like the classic pedalboards, and then you have Total Control over the Delay ... You'll be able to slow down or speed up the delay, accentuate it, change the sound in real time ... 

 

ELECTRIC VIOLIN & OCTAVER

(POWER & ETERNAL SUSTAIN)

ELECTRIC VIOLIN: Only sliding on the string gently, with the back or side of the X-Pick; HOW MANY TIMES HAVE YOU HOPED THAT YOUR BENDING WILL LAST IN ETERNAL GARY MOORE STYLE ???? ... NOW YOU CAN DO IT TOO !!! ALSO RECOMMENDED FOR LESS EXPENSIVE AND PERFORMING GUITARS !!

OCTAVER: Just slipping on the string with the back of the pick, adds more than an octave to the traditional guitar fretboard with a bright and powerful sound!

 

HYPER PICKING

THE TECHNIQUE BORN WITH THE X-PICK, that will allow you to play without touching the strings, and to interact only through magnetic fields! In this case the change in polarity of the magnetic field acts (Attraction/Repulsion), because the movement of the pick is right - left with respect to the string ...

 

MAGNETIC FIELDS TREMOLO

OTHER X-PICK TECHNIQUE, which differs from Hyper Picking, because the movement of the Pick with respect to the strings is up and down, that is, close to and away from the string quickly. In this case there is Compression of Magnetic Fields (Only Repulsion) TECHNIQUE THAT FINALLY WILL MAKES TREMOLO POSSIBLE EVEN ON LEVER-LESS GUITARS!

 

REVERSE / ROTARY

Technique that thanks to the magnetic fields, will gives us the possibility of having these effects even without a pedal board ... How many times have you brought the effects pedals to an evening of the band, to use them in a single song?

 

EPIC ATTACK: "THE GOD OF ROCK" 

Versatile and Innovative Pick Attack thanks to Neodymium, and speaking personally, it is one of the most exciting things this little treasure will makes with your support!

 

ULTRA MAGNETIC CONVENIENCE

You will be able to magnetically attach your X-Pick wherever you want thanks to the high magnetic degree: to an iron necklace, a bracelet, a belt, a ring, near any small iron part or small part of the same guitar as I did in the video, and speed up your changes from accompaniment to solo! 

 

MANY EFFECTS

In addition to the one shown above, and that you could see from the videos, you must keep in mind that the combinations of use of the X-Pick are infinite ... I am talking about the all different instruments we have, and therefore with different magnetic fields, completely new results , or used together with different pedals, amplifiers of various brands and powers, and I could go on forever as you well know… SO IT'S A NEW WORLD TO BE COMPLETELY DISCOVERED BY EACH OF YOU !!!

 

HANG OBJECTS

Hang a sheet on the refrigerator, Hang a screwdriver or hammer, Hang up the cell phone, ...

 

LEARN SCIENCE

With a Magnet so strong, it will be easier to learn the rules of magnetism at school, at home, anywhere ...

 

MAGNETIZE OBJECTS

Such as Screwdrivers, screws, Knives, paper clips, etc ...

On Technical Level

When you'll playing with the X-Pick, you will not hear those annoying hums due to too high gain or too open tones or exaggerated volumes ... This happens because the X-Pick, being made of ferrous material and magnetic, in contact with the strings, IMPROVE THE GROUNDING SYSTEM OF THE INSTRUMENT, closing better the mass that makes the usual turn in your body only from the left hand; a round of Grounding that is usually stopped by the normal picks of non-conducting material ...

On Philosophical Level

And for this I have to go a little personal ... Well, I'm one of those who sweated with work and the few savings his Gibson Les Paul Studio, and this desire to have it, created a bond ... let's say I'm one of those who believe that every instrument has a SOUL, a CONSCIENCE, and an OPINION to express… And when I play, I speak to her! SHE TALK TO ME! ...

So why not give maximum voice to this essence?

LET YOUR GUITAR OR BASS EXPRESS, IN NEW WAYS, WITH SOUNDS THAT HAVE NEVER HEARD OR PRODUCED, WITH NEW TECHNIQUES ... NEW VIBRATIONS !! ...

 

A simple Pick?

 

Because it is an expression of Fantasy and Style! Plus it's Super Fun! With X-Pick and your Creativity you will be One of the Most Original Musicians around!

Show everyone your Elegant Musical Dreams!

The X Picks, will be produced and shipped with:

  • MAGNETIC CERTIFICATION
  • PERFECT MOLD BASED ON PATENT (PENDING)
  • WITH A COATING AGAINST WEAR, AND TO IMPROVE THE GRIP BETWEEN THE FINGERS,
  • WITHOUT THE MINIMAL DEFECT OR IMPERFECTION!​

 

EVERYTHING IS READY FOR PRODUCTION!

At the end of the campaign, all it have to do is indicate a quantity to produce!

Subsequently, we will personally arrange for packaging and shipping, because we want to be SURE that everything we have shown and promised is completely respected!

X Pick is doing his best  but he would need some of your help ... 

And we'll thank you forever!

 

!!! GOOD MUSIC TO ALL !!!

 

 

 

 

Earn A Lot By Spreading The Word About X-Pick With KickBooster!

 

 

SALCUNI MARSIO - Creator & CEO

 

Pleased to meet you ...
story_txt:
Hello everyone ...
My name is Marsio Salcuni, and I am a lover of Music, Physics and Magnetism, and one day, I got the idea of ​​combining these three things in my own way! And I must admit that it didn't go badly ... That idea gave me the opportunity to build my first X-PICK, and start having fun experimenting and playing. As you can see from the videos, however, I started to understand that it was much more important than just having fun ... I discovered that it is a set of everything a guitarist or bassist should have always with him ... All enclosed in a little Gem!
Like a ... MultiFunction Army Knife ... made especially for Musicians, which combines a multitude of objects, which usually a guitarist buys and uses separately ... In addition to the fact that it gives us the possibility to do many things that could not be done in any other way, if not with the X-Pick ... Like Playing with Magnetic Fields!
I can not wait to see the thousand other facets that All of You are able to discover, moreover because each of you has different instruments, amplifiers, settings ... and being Magnetic Fields, they will always be different, with different results, different sounds, etc ...
Each of you will contribute to the growth of the X-Pick's capabilities, and yours! 
Because you will have 1000 more ways to MAKE MUSIC! 


The X-PICK has a size of 24 mm x 25 mm, a thickness of 4 mm and has a well-defined tip, but with a very wide angle (90° in Axial Position), such as to facilitate simple picking or normal fast picking.

The DESIGN, combined with the type of MAGNETIZATION, never creates problems of too much attraction towards the strings ... The maximum magnetic degree, is poured only on the faces of the magnet as Physics teaches us, and strong enough, but calculated, on the back of the X-Pick to use magnetic field modulation techniques! ... It is obvious, for example, that the bass strings suffer more attraction, given their thickness, but this in no way prevents the fast and precise picking, as you have seen from the videos because you can take advantage also of a Magnetic Trick, to improve Normal Picking and Fast Picking: "Exactly at the tip, at the union between the North and South magnetic fields, there is no attraction with the iron strings, but an imperceptible, but decisive repulsive force is felt, which facilitates the Picking, as if the string were thrown".
The reason is that the iron atoms of the string, being close to both polarities almost simultaneously (i.e. picking) do not have time to reorient themselves for the attraction, and combined with the fact that the power of magnetism always focuses on the faces of a magnet, I opted for axial magnetization that collides the opposite magnetic fields, right in the tip, and I created this kind of magnetism game to facilitate and speed up the movement of the pick ...
The rear corners are cut in order to facilitate the use of some particular techniques, and ensure the right degree of magnetism in the interaction between magnetic fields with the Pickups.
It has very smooth lateral surfaces to slide on the strings like a slide would and the back is the one that has the most magnetic degree, because it is the widest, suitable for all the innovative techniques that require magnetic field modulations of the pick-ups of the instruments


 


The direction of magnetization of the pick is AXIAL, in such a way as to adapt to any type of polarity of the pick ups on the market.
The X-Pick is made with material named NEODYMIUM, from the category of Rare Earth Permanent Magnets; is chemically composed with NdFeB (Neodymium-Iron-Boron) and has the highest degree of magnetism that exists: N52. 
It have a Coating named (Ni-Cu-Ni- Epoxy) that is, a Nickel-Copper-Nickel composition and a final layer of Epoxy Resin to give more grip in contact with the fingers, as well as for protection from wear …
 
MAGNETIC FIELDS (with iron powder):


  


"X- PICK"
ALL IN NEODYMIUM N52
THE ONLY MAGNETIC PICK OF ALL TIMES
+
ROUND PLASTIC CASE
TO PROTECT THE X-PICK AND
ALWAYS CARRY IT WITH YOU !!
 



"X- PICK"
ALL IN NEODYMIUM N52
THE ONLY MAGNETIC PICK OF ALL TIMES
+
WOODEN DISPLAY BOX
​TO SHOW IT IN ALL ITS SPLENDOR: 
- AT YOUR HOME, 
- WHERE YOU PLAY WITH YOUR BAND, 
- IN THE SHOWCASE OF YOUR SHOP, 
- OR FOR A PHANTASMAGORIC
 GIFT TO GIVE TO A MUSICIAN !!

- NON-SLIP MAGNET
WHICH ALLOWS THE X-PICK TO REMAIN
ERECTED FOR EXPOSURE, IN FRONT OF

+
    
AND IN ADDITION WITH THE CHOICE "EXPO" 
YOU WILL ALSO HAVE THE "TACTICAL" CASE
TO PROTECT THE X-PICK AND TAKE IT WITH YOU

story:
Alter X and Y

guitar pedals and desktop processors

We at Folktek have been around for years, creating unique synthesizers and audio works.

Please follow us on instagram @folktek for updates and see our other work there and on folktek.com

 

The widely loved and highly regarded effects of Alters 1(X) and 2(Y) were originally in eurorack format but we've decided to extend the processing to both guitar pedal players and studio musicians. 

There are two different pedals, each with the same design but with 7 effects unique to each.

There are two versions of the pedal which are physically identical except the name "Alter X" and "Alter Y". Internally each has an entirely different set of 7 DSP effects meticulously designed over the course of a year by Arius Blaze (Folktek) with digital programming by Nico Raftis (Macro Machines).

 

For the guitar player, Alter has relay-based buffered bypass with true stereo 1/4" ins and outs. Also utilize the CV (control voltage) over the effects controls with a CV source and/or a CV expression pedal such as the Moog EP-3 expression pedal.

For the synth player who wants a desktop effects unit, use the 1/8" or 1/4" ins and outs and utilize the CV over all main effects controls.

 

 

CONTROL common with both Alter X and Y

 

  • Buffered relay-based bypass over 1/4" inputs.

-

  • Controls for mix, X, Y and filter as well as clock bitrate.

  • All effects have a variation of a filter which may change effect to effect.

  • Touch-based effect change by touching the gold hexagon. Effects indicated by lighted control panel.
  • X and Y control various rates, feedback and time over the different effects.
  • Clock control adjusts the rate which controls the DSP which can drastically change the effect. In doing so it does slightly lower the quality of the output signal but the results are fantastic. This clock is not for synchronization.
  • Mix, X, Y and filter all have CV control inputs.
  • Trails on the guitar side. 
  • Each control level or cv input is visualized on the control panel.
  • Powered with included 12v negative tip supply.
  • Dimensions: 6" x 5" x 1 3/8"

 

X Pedal Effects:

  1. long delay
  2. tight, notated granular delay
  3. huge plate reverb
  4. shimmering reverb
  5. distortion and multi-filter
  6. pitch delay
  7. stutter glitch

 

Y Pedal Effects

  1. analog delay
  2. reverb with infinite capture and lp + hp filters 
  3. choral reverb
  4. palindrome reverse delay - backward/forward repeat
  5. time stretch
  6. pitch shift (notated semi-tones
  7. time stretch glitch

 

Explorations

We've teamed up with some of our favorite artists, allowing them free reign to use the pedals as they like and they've made us an array of fantastic videos  for you to get a sampling of effects, sounds and possibilities. Please visit each to see their other work.

There will be more videos to come.

 

Rory Khan

Find Rory on instagram @rory_khan_mohon

 
 

 

Justin Melland

Find Justin Melland on instagram @justinmellandmusic

 
 

Richard Devine

Find Richard Devine on instagram @richarddevine

 
 

Nero Bellum

Find Nero Bellum on instagram @nero_bellum_official

 
 

Redstripe Down

Find Red Stripe Down on instagram @redstripedown

 
 

Official Alter videos in eurorack form allow you to get a real sense for each individual effect:

 

Pitch Black was also featured in the main video.

Find Pitch Black on instagram @pitch.black

 

 

Press

Get a Folktek Alter Pedal X and Y press kit



Goals and offerings

Our goal is simple: to put things out in the world that physically reflect the beauty of the internal design. By preordering you're helping us to do that because production can be rather costly. We're keeping our campaign simple: order either pedal X, Y or both. Each pedal will include a power supply and orders of both pedals will also receive a power splitter.

For dealers, you're welcome to preorder the Alters for your shop rather than wait for an entirely new run. The dealer price is reflective of our wholesale pricing when ordering 10 or more pedals.

 

How you can help

Please get the word out. The more successful we are with this campaign the more easily we can reach our goal by fully devoting ourselves to the project.

 

Shipping and Payment

We've already perfected the Alter circuit as we've been putting them out for years as eurorack modules and embedded in instruments called Resonant Gardens and Nano Gardens. We've gone through multiple prototypes and finalized our design of the guitar elements. We've teamed up with a manufacturer we're confident in and believe we'll have no problem reaching our ship date. That said, a ship date is only an estimation - we actually expect to be able to ship them far in advance of our ship date. We put our estimate on this quite a ways back and our goal is to fulfill our orders before the date provided, leaving ourselves, our parts suppliers and our circuit manufacturer  leeway. We've had other crowdfunding campaigns and have learned plenty from our mistakes and embraced our successes.

story:
Overview

Zuno ANC Wireless Earbuds have been designed with real functionality in mind.

✅ 100% Recycled and Recyclable

✅ Multi mode Active Noise cancelling

✅Secure and Comfortable Fit

✅Premium Sound Quality

✅IPX6 Waterproof Rating

✅USB-C Fast Charging

✅Bluetooth 5.0

✅ Crystal clear call

✅Touch Control

✅Stable Wireless Connection

 

Zuno ANC earbuds compared to AirPods Pro :

* 3 times cheaper 

* 30% more sound isolation 

* Twice more battery life

 

 

By picking up the Zuno ANC earbuds by Doppler Sound.

Built from 100% recycled plastic, these earbuds are one of the most eco-friendly options in the market today.

                             

The packaging is recycled and recyclable, as well as the aluminium used in the earphones. Every component has been carefully considered to have as little impact on the environment as possible, both in production and when they are disposed of. So you don’t need to worry too much about the environmental impact. ​

The eco-friendly Zuno ANC earphones by Doppler Sound not only sound great but also reduce your carbon footprint.

While taking small steps like using Zuno earphones get a thumbs up from Mother Nature, we should also start looking into other ways to reduce our carbon footprint. 

 

Zuno’s noise-cancelling technology is tuned to adapt to your environment by cycling through three modes: travelling, walking, and chilling. These modes vary in intensity, and walking mode allows the ingress of external noise, so you’re aware of what’s happening around you.

 

Zuno Wireless Earbuds are smartly designed to produce the most enjoyable audio entertainment experience. Stop overpaying for inferior products and get Zuno ANC earbuds at an affordable price. Zuno delivers the best sound quality with really effective Active Noise-cancelling to give you a quiet world in the noisy city. All the features you need and more, all in one; you will not be disappointed.

 

 

 

 

Whether you want to experience better audio entertainment, enjoy your conversations better, protect your hearing, or boost your concentration and focus, noise-canceling earphones are your perfect fit. 

 

Intelligent noise reduction mode can effectively eliminate real-time environmental noise and provide an excellent listening experience to satisfy your use in rich scenarios.

Active noise-cancelling (ANC) headphones employ sound-matching technology to "erase" external sounds. They work by identifying the pitch of nearby ambient sound, such as the whir of a jet engine or the collective hum of a coffee shop full of people; they're most effective in places where the overall sound and volume remain constant.

 

 

 

Ear tips are important, but why does everyone keep ignoring them? 

With your previous earphone, it’s very possible that you’re not getting the right fit with ear tips, and that can have consequences like poorer sound quality, worse isolation, and discomfort.

We’ve simply spend several month in order to test a hundreds set of earbuds in our test fixture to see how each style, material and size affects the sound, fit and isolation.

 

Custom fit ear tips provide a good seal, which is the single most important thing you can do to make your music & ANC sound much better.

We have noticed, there are a few variables when it comes to picking out the right ear tips. But like any good recipe, once we understand all of the ingredients and what pairings work, thats make our final product is that much more enjoyable. All it takes is how to define we plan on using Zuno earbuds and figuring out what style and material seem the most fitting.

 

- 6 pairs of silicone ear tips with 2 different shapes
- 3 pairs of memory foam ear tips for special ear shapes and uses

 

 

 

Making or answering calls in a noisy environment can be a nightmare, and you can tell that your caller is struggling to make sense of what you’re saying because there’s usually lots of “Excuse me”, or “What? I cannot hear you!” or “Sorry, can you please repeat that?” 

So much so that you have to leave that environment briefly (if you can), answer your call and then come back in.

 

 

The 11mm Titanium dynamic speaker, equipped with 100% recycled aluminium alloy, is carefully tuned by our professional sound engineers and delivers HQ sound and music. We carefully adjusted the low, medium and high frequency to display rich, detailed, clear and premium sound.

Zuno's chipset, combined with Bluetooth 5.0, ensures audio and video sync perfectly. You can enjoy a stable and strong connection while watching your videos.

With AAC and SNC codecs technology, Zuno performs better with lower lag than ever before. That's how it empowers playing and gaming experience.

Zuno was designed for ALL DAY use, with high-capacity battery allow for 1 full charge from the earbuds of continuous audio playback and an additional 3 times charges from the case. 

With Zuno, you can extend your battery life by 8 hours. In fact, you can use your earbuds non-stop for 15 straight hours on ANC mode only.

 

Need a quick charge? Just 10 minutes in the case gives you 120 minutes call.

When you use Zuno, battery life is a non-issue, you can talk for as much as you want, work out for as long as you want, and listen to music for the entire day. 

 

Worried whether your earbuds will stop working if they get wet? Stop worrying; thanks to IPX5 technology, you can make calls outdoors in the rain. Water wetting your Zuno earbuds is not a problem at all. Whether you spill a glass of water on them, or they fall in a puddle, your Zuno earphones will still work flawlessly.

 

 

 

We have collaborated with our French designers to make Zuno earbuds stand out from our competitors. Zuno earbuds combine simple & minimalist design with French elegance.

 

 

Jonathan & Jonathan, the two French founders of Doppler Sound, established an HQ office in Hong Kong, Kowloon, and brought together a team of audio enthusiasts. We have team members originally from France, Hong Kong and Mainland China. Our background includes senior acoustic-engineering lead and consultants for leading OEM manufacturers.

At Doppler Sound, we strive to create the ultimate user experience by leading the way in acoustic innovation and premium sound design. We are constantly looking to preserve hearing through expert audio engineering and problem-solving. With the Zuno ANC Earphones, we deliver users an all-in-one solution, blending substance and style that meet the varied needs of today’s serious audiophiles. 

We contract with the top-tier laboratories and factories with advanced testing and production equipment in order to achieve industry-leading products and quality.

 

At Doppler Sound, we strive to create the ultimate user experience by leading the way in acoustic innovation and premium sound design. We are constantly looking for preserve hearing through expert audio engineering and problem-solving. With the Zuno ANC Earphones, we deliver users an all-in-one solution, blending substance and style that meet the varied needs of today’s serious audiophiles.

We have designed the Zuno ANC Earphones, and the following table speaks for itself:

 

Help us to spread the word about ZUNO earbuds by sharing ZUNO with your friends! We also give 1USD extra to an environmental organisation per referral.

1 referral = One 3-in-1 cable + 1 USD extra to an environmental organisation per referral.

5 referrals = One extra Zuno earbuds + 1 USD extra to an environmental organisation per referral.

How to share:

  • You need to have backed ZUNO
  • When you are a backer, log into your Indiegogo account
  • Check and copy your campaign link
  • Share your link with your friends, family and anyone you want!

How to check your referrals:

  • Log into your Indiegogo account
  • Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page
  • Select the “My Profile” option
  • Click on the “Referrals” tab to check your referrals and contributions
  • Count the number of funders

 

We are fully confident about our production and logistics ability to supply a steady flow of our earphones to the market. And that's despite the virus situation around the world, which fortunately has calmed down significantly, especially in China. Our team have years of experience in product development. We have a very close relationship with the factory, which means we can keep an eye on everything to make sure everything runs smoothly.

story:
Magnetic Vlogging Microphone - easier than ever, expressive design, exceptional sound. Introducing - PowerDeWise CharisMic!

 

This innovatively designed lapel microphone combines an easy-to-use magnetic clip with customizable badges for an individual style.

 

Clear sound is the foundation to which we add extra comfort as you have never experienced before. The result: an easy-to-use mic that truly stands out.

 

It’s time to start creating content with a twist. Our unique badge design will highlight your appearance on any social media platform - YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, etc.

 

 

A VERY interesting TEST... :)

 

Thanks to the original magnetic swap system, you can set the mic up in just a few seconds and in more ways than one.

 

Choose from 4 options:​

 

  • Place the mic under your clothes and clip a badge on top.

 

 

  • Position the clip in a suitable position and attach/detach the mic freely.

 

 

  • Use the magnetic holder under your T-shirt to position the mic on your clothes.

 

 

  • Place the mic on your body and clip it with the patch to make the mic completely invisible.

 

 

 

It has never been easier to start shooting a video with a lapel microphone set up in seconds. The magnet swap system completely removes the headache with lapel mics. Now your mic is ready to go in just a few simple moves.

 

Thinking ahead, badges can create a subliminal association between the speaker and a specific emotion, action, or theme. By wearing a “like” or “bell’ badge you subtly motivate the viewer to push those buttons. Magnetic badges are not only about the style they’re actually an influencing tool.

 

 

We have custom-designed the electronics and have only used Grade A components to offer the highest level of performance, reliability, durability, and ease of use.

 

 

 

You'll find the right badge to go with any content type, be it streaming, teaching, podcasting, or interviewing.

 

 

Can the CharisMic be attached like a common lapel mic?  Of course. It still comes with a familiar clip, also magnet-based, secured to your clothes. This way, you can have the clip on you and connect the mic freely without setting up the clip over and over again.

 

 

Stylish mic? Invisible mic? Innovative magnetic clip? All that in one box! 

 

 

 

By studying the needs of our customers and thinking ahead, we have combined innovation with style and have kept the quality of our microphones consistently high.

 

 

Despite the bright and eye-catching badges, CharisMic can also be the opposite. Sometimes you need a mic to be invisible. That is why we have provided body patches for you to get the viewer’s attention fully focused on your charisma.

 

 

The mic is compatible with all video equipment. It’s easy enough for new users and variable enough for professional content creators.  You only need to choose an adapter for your device.

 

 

Every CharisMic comes with a TRRS plug and a TRRS to TRS adapter in the box. So you can use it with smartphones by connecting directly with a 3.5 mm input and DSLRs, camcorders, or any recorder through a 4-3 PIN adapter, which we have put in the box for you.

Furthermore, for true compatibility, we’ve created various device-specific options. Choose the Lightning adapter or the Type-C adapter in Add-ons.

 

 

A wide range of badges allows you to choose any style you want. And it's only limited by our imagination.

 

 

We’ve been working on this product to make it different from what we have seen before - because, hey, we all are different too.

 

 

We’ve designed the CharisMic to be comfortable and stylish so that you don’t use it because you have to, but because you want to!

 

 

 

CharisMic is a versatile art tool for a wide variety of content creators. It adapts to any need - whether you want it to be invisible or eye-catching. You’ll find the right badge to go with any content type, be it streaming, teaching, podcasting, or interviewing. What’s more, the badges can match any topic you cover!

 

 

CharisMic is for influencers who want to change the world and make it a better place by using their words. We aimed to help people already on their path and as well as those who are about to start. Our product is great for both cases as it is perfect for bringing a fresh breath into an existing vlog and it is the easiest and most comfortable lapel microphone for a beginner.

 

 

Need interview set? Check out our dual rewards!

 

 

Great Gift for your friends who have vlog or dreaming about it - CharisMic! 

 

 

 

 

 

PowerDeWise is a vlogger-oriented team with 5 years of experience and million happy customers. Our main goal is to help influencers record their words perfectly. We believe words can change lives, and words that have been properly recorded and shared can change the lives of millions.

Progress does not stand still and we’re keeping pace with the times. By studying the needs of our customers and thinking ahead, we have combined innovation with style and have kept the quality of our microphones consistently high.

 

 

 

Each of you can help make our dream a reality and we have the deepest appreciation for all of your support. It’s always good to share some positive vibes. Follow us on social media and help share the campaign.

 

Risks and challenges

COVID-19 has and is still creating delays in shipping goods around the world. We all hope that by the time we have to ship, things will get back to normal! We are very experienced in shipping worldwide and you will be updated regarding the shipping process continuously.

story:
Dome doesn't claim to have the "best sound" in headphones... Just the most innovative, versatile, fashionable, and functional "audio-wear" headphones in the world... And yes, the audio fidelity is as bonafide as it is unique!

 

 

 

Dome Audio Inc. is an east coast based company, established in January 2019. Its founder and IP developer, Ben White, is a veteran of the music industry. His decades as a professional musician, songwriter, and producer have afforded him invaluable insight in audio and sound fidelity.

The basic design and function of headphones have not changed since 1919 when Nathaniel Baldwin invented the headphones. After 100 years, a revolutionary headphone experience, by Dome, has emerged!

Predictable Designs Certified Technology

Predictable Designs has reviewed this campaign's electronic and/or software design and verified that it is feasible for manufacturing. 

First Headphones to provide Full-Fidelity Audio, while still allowing you to hear the world around you... "The Best of Both Worlds"

 

 

Bone Conduction: How it Works

Bone conduction technology has been around for decades.  It works on the premises of vibration. With bone conduction speakers, the sound doesn’t travel by air as in conventional headphones, but rather by vibration through solid mediums. When bone conduction speakers are placed around the head, the vibration resonates with the bones of your head producing an acoustic effect unique to you.

An example of how bone conduction works can be seen with Beethoven, the 18th-century composer. Ludwig Van Beethoven eventually became almost completely deaf.  For him to hear, he would attach a metal rod to his piano while clenching it with his teeth.  He became aware of sound because the vibrations transferred from the piano to his jawbone.  His ability to hear the music was no longer entirely dependent upon his ears.

Thomas Dawson is a Master Recording Engineer, accomplished Musician, Producer, Composer, and Music Director. Dawson is at the forefront of music technology trends and has worked with music icons including Beyonce and JLO.  

 

 

“Dome headphones™ has changed the game with an ingenious way to experience all things audio!”​ 

 

 

 

 

When you own a pair of Dome Headphones™, you own a part of innovation that's paving the "Future Of Sound", with The World's First, Patent Pending, "Surround Sound", Bone Conduction Headphones,

 

 
 

 

 
Dome Up!

Dome's D4 Headphones™ is designed to change the game. A revolutionary milestone with a true open ear, wireless stereo. We are immensely inspired by the result thus far.

 
Dome’s exclusive, patent-pending, noise isolation covers are interchangeable. The look and style of Dome Headphones can be changed on the fly.​  
 

 

Going The Extra Mile

We have gone the extra mile in all directions to bring true innovation to a stagnant corner of the tech industry. Dome D4 Headphones is an innovative approach to conventional headphones, an entirely new kind of product and significantly raises the bar in wearable audio tech. 

In the unlikely scenario that unexpected delays arise, we will maintain clear and open lines of communication with our supporters to keep them informed.

Support us on Indiegogo and join the revolution. Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help support Dome:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools. Thank You!

 

 

 

 

 

The Future... Dome Signature Covers!

We have gone the extra mile in all directions to bring true innovation to a stagnant corner of the tech industry. Dome D4 Headphones is an innovative approach to conventional headphones, an entirely new kind of product and significantly raises the bar in wearable audio tech. 
In the unlikely scenario that unexpected delays arise, we will maintain clear and open lines of communication with our supporters to keep them informed.
Support us on Indiegogo and join the revolution. Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help support Dome:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools. Thank You!

 

 
 


 

 
The Future... Dome Signature Covers!

story:
Transforms anything hollow into a speaker, at any time

HumBird Speaker is the world’s smallest and most versatile bone conduction speaker that allows you to have a different but always spectacular experience of sound anywhere, in any context. Transforms anything hollow Into a speaker, at any time

Hear Everything Around You

HumBird Speaker allows you to listen to music, follow podcasts, have individual phone conversations or conference calls, and even enjoy an amazing experience of the sound of your games, videos or films played on your device. 

It works like a humBird, small but powerful. It delivers a high sound volume, being 4 to 5 times louder than the average cell phone speakers' volume, reaching up to 115db, and it allows you to personalize the tone quality.

Be Blown Away by True Wireless Stereo

We highly recommend you to use two HumBird Speakers interconnected, you can have a Surround Sound 2.0 experience since this innovative Bluetooth-enabled device is also TWS-enabled. 

 

Different Surfaces, Different Sounds

HumBird uses bone conduction technology to offer you a DIY customizable experience of sound. You can test and enjoy different sounds—almost as if different instruments are used. Place It on top of different surfaces such as a guitar, a kraft box, a plastic storage box, photo frames, sports helmet or even dashboards can provide you varying of sound effects. 

In the same way, the following elements generate the following sound effects:

Portable and lightweight

Along with having an extremely beautiful design, HumBird Speaker is extremely compact. In fact, it only has 40 mm of diameter and it weighs as little as 35 grams , being only slightly larger than a coin. You can take it in your wallet, pocket or even hung around your neck in a necklace or in a keychain.

Everything has its own sounds

Adopting bone conduction technology and moving coil acoustic technology, Humbird Speaker turns sound into a mechanic vibration of different frequencies, leveraging the effects of the different materials on top of which it is placed and used. Its vibrations produce a truly original, variable and customizable collection of sounds through self-vibration. Everything has its own sound, how many sounds did you discover by now?

 

Enjoy the Radio Tunes, Everywhere

Radio is timeless and it’s the kind of company that you don’t want to do without. Whether it is to listen to music selections played by your favorite hosts or to listen to the thoughts and facts shared on your favorite shows, HumBird’s wireless FM radio ensures that you can enjoy your favorite radio tunes everywhere.

 

Made for Tasteful Pioneers

Due to its aesthetically remarkable and compact design as well as to its impressive features, HumBird speaker is the perfect choice for tasteful pioneers who want to come first as early technology adopters with a strong appreciation for smart design.

Stretch Goal

Once we reach $40,000USD, every backer will get a free velvet pouch and a phone ring stand.

 

Other Specifications

  • Type C charging port
  • Get 80% of power in 15 min
  • Get full charge in 30 minutes
  • High voltage and capacity battery in 400 mah for 3 hours working time
  • Sound frequency range: 200Hz--20K Hz
  • Case made with robust aviation aluminum alloy with shine CD pattern;

 

Glue testing scene

 

Sucker strength testing

 

Project Timeline

story:
Don’t you wish you could read to the child in your life every day?

That would be a wonderful thing. Unfortunately, sometimes life gets in the way, and it's hard to maintain that special bonding time.  With Read To Me, you can record yourself reading any children's book. Once you're done recording, Read to Me attaches inside the back cover of the book. The child in your life can then hear you read to them, in your own unique voice, simply by opening their book and pressing the buttons.

Give the gift of reading to them

Device mounts directly into your child's book, allowing them to access it anytime.

Easy for young children to use, even if they don't yet know their letters and numbers.

Quality sound recording and playback: at a moderate volume

Easily record yourself

Microphone is built-in. No extra equipment, devices, or apps required.

Re-record as much as you need, until it’s just right.

Hidden recording function prevents accidental erasure.

 

 

Plays back page-by-page

Included page stickers show which button to press, and when.

You decide where to place them— by page or by spread.

Easy to find, but won’t detract from the book’s artwork.

 

We had you in mind when we designed

Separated parents. Grandparents who can't visit often. Cool aunts and uncles. Deployed service members. Parents working swing shift. Older siblings away at college. Awesome family friends.  Nannies, teachers, therapists, tutors, helpers, or anyone who has a  special child in their life, who wants to maintain a bond while instilling a love of reading. 

With 21 buttons, each holding 30 seconds of recording time, the Read to Me book companion can be used with virtually any children's book! 

The great news is... we are in production! 

We have a prototype. We have our safety certifications. We have a patent pending. But now we need you! We chose to fund our first run of manufacturing through Indiegogo because this product is so personal to us. Books shaped who we are. For us Read to Me is about helping people connect through literature and helping kids develop a love of books. We didn't want Read to Me swallowed up by some online goliath or big box retailer.

It is also very important to us that Read to Me to remain affordable, and still use high quality components and materials. Anyone should be able to afford to hear a good story. The majority of our engineering efforts were focused on sound quality. Your voice is the most important part of Read to Me, we wanted to ensure it faithfully reproduces it.  And it does! We want your experience to be meaningful. 

Funding our initial manufacturing run of 5,000 units through Indiegogo will allow us to maintain control and make sure Read to Me remains the product we envisioned. 

Once your Read To Me arrives, the big question is... which book will you put it in? 

Reading together builds empathy, connection, and life long memories. With Read to Me you can build those memories together and then keep them fresh even if you live far away. 

Who are we?

 

Kids love books

...but sometimes they need a little help

 

 

With Read to Me the child in your life never needs to be without a good story. 

The Read to Me recorder is so easy it can be used by book lovers from 2 to 20 to 200! 

Other Ways to Help

Reading to children fosters imagination, a love of knowledge, literature, and maybe most importantly, a sense of connection. Help us make it possible for any child to have a book read to them whenever they like.  Please share our campaign with your friends, on social media, and with the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Airpatch Taking Flight!

Thanks to the generous support of our backers, we have delivered first of it's kind wireless control for audio effects pedals! Airpatch has landed and is performing amazingly. All campaign perks have been fulfilled!

The Aviate Audio team is beyond excited hear your experience using it. Thank you for making this possible!

Product Packaging

 

Airpatch Latch Mode Demo

 

Airpatch Range Test

ALL PERKS HAVE SHIPPED!

We are here to answer your questions and provide support!

 

All Indiegogo Perks out the door. Look for yours in the mail!

The Aviate Audio Story

The concept for Airpatch began with the idea that flexible controls for audio effects could be added directly to our musical instruments. After years of prototyping, testing and user feedback, we are proud to introduce Airpatch.

Our motto is “Elevate Your Play”. Airpatch goes beyond solving practical problems faced by musicians. It’s about unlocking new sounds and expression and making our beloved effects a part of our actual musical instrument. Your support is needed to help us take this to the next level, launch Airpatch and open up a new universe of possibilities for all of us to elevate our musical performance.

What We Need & What You Get

In addition to our game changing product, we have t-shirts for sale featuring graphics by Buffalo, NY designers. The rocket graphic illustrates the launch of Airpatch coinciding with the feeling of ‘Elevate Your Play’. Get our best price on Airpatch when you join our mailing list or bundle with a t-shirt. For those who want to take it to the next level, Airpatch is available in a two pack. All perks come with a logo sticker.

Beyond helping deliver Airpatch for the first time ever, funding from this campaign will support critical development activities for our product including:

  • Tooling for the Airpatch aluminum enclosure and precision molded parts
  • FCC testing and certification to help ensure the reliability of our wireless system
  • Participation in the National Association of Music Merchants trade show (NAMM) where we will take Airpatch from crowdfunding to the commercial level. We can't wait to continue sharing our story from NAMM!

See Airpatch in action in the music video for our campaign!

 

How It Works

At its core Airpatch is an effects loop switcher, but there are some major differences: instead of activating it with your foot, there is a one-button wireless controller that brings your effects right to your instrument. Our controller uses a finish friendly suction cup attachment that will mount reliably anywhere on your instrument without marking the surface.

Three Powerful Modes

Connect one or more pedals into the effects loop and you will be able to control them with three different modes that will elevate interaction with your effects.

Latch Mode: Works just like your pedals. Press the button to turn them on, press again to turn them off. Connect multiple pedals in the effects loop to eliminate back and forth 'tap dancing' experienced when activating multiple effects at once!

Momentary Mode: Momentary mode is the game changing feature that will wow other musicians and audiences at shows. With responsive control, your effects are activated by pressing and holding the button. Use expressive delays and choruses, add bursts of distortion, use Airpatch like a whammy bar by connecting to a pitch shifter. Leave the effects loop empty and Airpatch will function like a killswitch. The options are endless! How will you use it?

Reverse Momentary Mode: Works just like momentary mode, but your effects default to 'on'. The effects loop is bypassed for as long as the button is pressed. Have you ever been able to interact with you pedals like this before?

Easy mode selection: Change modes with a a press of the single button located on the Airpatch dock. A three color LED indicator will indicate which mode you are using.

Pairing

Pairing your controller is easy. Hold down the mode selection button on the dock for three seconds and the light will blink. Press the wireless controller you would like to pair and you've paired it to the dock. Our pairing feature is useful if you want to put a button on each of your guitars.

Technical Details

  • 2.4 GHz wireless signal, similar to other low latency wireless guitar transmitters
  • 9v center negative barrel connector - compatible with standard pedal board power systems (power supply not included)
  • Over 50 feet of range (line of sight)
  • Long battery life controller will last for multiple performances on a single charge. We recharge about 1x/ week with regular use
  • Magnetic USB charging cable for controller with estimated 45 minute charging time
  • Wireless controller has an LED indicator that blinks white when you activate the button. The blink turns red when you have about 1 hour of battery remaining.

The Impact

You know our mission - to create amazing tools that help elevate musical performance. We are building our company in Buffalo, NY. We can't thank our local startup community enough for all the support. We have long term goals to deliver a range of products that fulfill our company vision and build a new sustainable business in our region.

Risks & Challenges

The product development journey is long and trying. We have a clear plan forward to scale up our production. We set our delivery of Airpatch for December 2019 to account for unexpected delays in production. We have received feedback from thousands of musicians and industry professionals through trade shows and focus groups. We know Airpatch will meet the strict demands of music gear enthusiasts.

Other Ways You Can Help

Do you know any musicians that might like our product? Share our campaign! You can share the campaign link our use the Indiegogo social media sharing tools.

story:
In today’s digital world, everyone deserves the unbeatable sound of true wireless earbuds, free from cables and comfortable enough to forget they're even in your ears. But until now, earbuds with these qualities typically cost as much as $159 a pair.

Introducing Nano Pods earbuds, with incredible sound quality, rock-solid connection, total comfort, and an affordable price for everyone.

Nano Pods is the world's first TWS under $20, with advanced features and incredible sound. They represent the most complete wireless earbuds solution at the lowest price ever.

 

 

 

Hands-On Review

Check Us from Youtube Channel OSReviews! OSReviews specializes on consumer electronics and historic throwbacks on products which have shaped the technology industry. Thanks so much for this awesome work!

 
 

 

Equipped with the latest Graphene audio technology for dynamic sound. Graphene is an incredible new ‘super material’ made up of a single layer of carbon atoms in a hexagonal pattern. It is the thinnest, lightest, and strongest material, with unusual properties that make it perfect for audio applications. 

Like all speakers, earbuds recreate sound by moving a dynamic driver with an electric voice coil. Drivers made out of Graphene are incredibly thin and light and require less power input to accurately create sound. Not only is Graphene very thin, but it is also one of the best conductors of electricity in the world which makes Graphene-based drivers incredibly energy efficient and perfect for mobile audio. 

Nano Pods utilize this technology with an Apple certificated tuner to further refine the sound and achieve perfectly balanced and precise stereo audio.

 


 

 

Bluetooth 5.0 is the ubiquitous wireless technology’s latest iteration which enhances connectivity within a 10m range and maintains a super stable wireless connection. A stronger connection means that music is streamed flawlessly with lower power consumption that translates into less recharging and longer playback times. 

 

   

 

As active, digital natives, we understand the need to go longer between recharges. Nano Pods were designed with unrivaled battery life. They provide up to 5 hours of play time off of a single charge and when used in conjunction with the patented charging case, 25 hours of total play time can be achieved. It will get you through any workout and entertain you during days of travel.

 

   

 

 

 

The touch buttons on the earphones allow you to control the music and answer/reject calls in a simple and intuitive way…

 

Single Tap to Pause/Play music

 

Press 2 seconds to reject calls when the phone rings

 

 

Double tap to skip a song

    

 

       

 

 

Nano Pods are engineered to stay comfortably in your ears on the go during any activity, with a total of three different size ear tips included. With a lightweight, comfort-fit design, you won’t feel anything except the music.

 

 

 

 

     

  • Smart Assistant

Nano Pods is compatible with Siri/Google Assistant/ and smart speakers. Simply long press the button to activate your favorite personal assistant without having to remove the earbuds or touch your phone. 

    

 

  • Sweatproof

Like all good earbuds, Nano Pods are sweatproof and durable enough for working out or any sporting activity.  Get your jam on and exercise at the same time. 

    

 

  • Light indicator

The red lights flash when it is charging in the case.

 

 

And the cover of the charging case is designed with a stretched line, convenient for opening the charging case.

story:
Quick and effective communication is key in today’s complex business world.

Need to record, transcribe and translate an interview, lecture, or discussion? Journalist record interviews for maximum accuracy and efficiency, making note-taking nearly impossible during a vibrant conversation or long meeting. The problem comes when take that recording and translate it into text. In the past, they have to spent lots of time to sit and transcribe every interview.

S01, created by Wooask, is designed to address this issue. Using the latest technologies in speech recognition, machine translation and the advance of NLP technology, it offers 48 languages and 38 accents speech to text transcribe and translate, sync to cloud for store, edit and share, changing the traditional dictation and document creation workflow.

Travel restrictions, quarantines, 2020 is a hard time for most of us, we have to work from home to stay safe. Everyone in the office can communicate face to face, but at a time when most meetings, events, and classes are going virtual, remote workers and students increasingly struggle to listen and pay attention while taking notes, because they are often distracted by the kids, the dogs, or the other things. Wooask S01 has a new feature that provide real time transcription, edit & share to all participants, making remote work and learning more accessible and productive.

  

Language barriers exist because of who we are, what we do, and where we came from. 

With Wooask SO1, your opportunities beyond imagination. The S01 is the World's First 86 Languages AI Voice Transcription Recorder, with up to 97% accuracy in 48 languages and 38 accents, it’s an ideal intelligent device to improve your day-to-day working life. Whether closing a deal in Alaska, making friends around the globe during your trip, or talking with hearing impaired persons, you will instantly understand any form of language. 

How to get data from a recorder - even missing?

Wooask S01 secures you from thieves and loss. Recordings will be automatically saved to the cloud in your desired language, ready for you to download, edit and share them on PC and other device. The cloud can store up to 100 hours of audio, so you don’t have to worry about running out of space. And you can also upgrade as much cloud storage space as you want. 

All the data is stored in the recorder with 16G data storage for recording. When you connect to the mobile phone, the recordings will be synchronized and save in your mobile phone, then you have full control whenever to delete, edit and share on various social medias like Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp in DOCX/PDF/TXT etc. formats.

Wooask S01 knows your voice is unique. To make transcriptions even more accurate, we use voice detection and noise cancellation to focus on the sound of your voice, make sure it is crystal clear without unwanted noise nearby. So your message isn’t muddied by motorcycle traffic and tapping pens, and you’ll never mince words with whoever’s sitting next to you.  

Wouldn't it be a disaster if the recorder ran out of batteries when you needed it the most? This recorder has such a long battery life that it isn't even a risk. It can stay in standby mode for an astonishing 30 days and record continuously for up to 10 hours on a single charge. It only takes 30 minutes to charge this recorder with a USB cable, so battery life is never an issue. From Beijing to Frankfurt, if you've been looking for a great way to record conversations, this is it.

Time is money. An average page of text takes approximately 2 minutes to speak but 14 minutes to type, which means speaking presents an 86% time saving. 

With Wooask S01, after recording hours of audio, a trusted transcription service can be utilized to convert it into an editable, shareable text file in minutes.

The S01 is small enough to go almost everywhere.

That’s because it’s as small as an USB Flash Drive, 17g weighs almost nothing and has an impressive battery life that just got a massive update. To make things even more covert, there’s a back splint which lets you clip it to your collar or notebook - perfect for recording meeting at your workspace.  

Without connected to the mobile APP, Wooask S01 can comes with earphones to listen to your recordings right from the device, and a USB cable to move your recordings onto a computer and charge your recorder.

The problem comes when take that recording and translate it into text. In the past, they have to spent lots of time to sit and transcribe every interview.S01, created by Wooask, is designed to address this issue. Using the latest technologies in speech recognition, machine translation and the advance of NLP technology, it offers 48 languages and 38 accents speech to text transcribe and translate, sync to cloud for store, edit and share, changing the traditional dictation and document creation workflow.Travel restrictions, quarantines, 2020 is a hard time for most of us, we have to work from home to stay safe. story:
"AMPLFY is a revolutionary platform which disrupts the traditional methods of manufacturing and producing portable speakers, whilst having a positive impact on the environment and the community." Peter Ball, Impact Academy. 

Our mission is to empower the world to become tinkerers, creators and innovators. We want to encourage people to think creatively about the world that they live in and how they can make it a better place. To get started, we want to teach people to build their own portable speakers and provide a digital platform for people to sell them. We provide the kits and instructions to help you build the speaker the way you want.  

Ruby is the first speaker kit designed so that you can build it for the occasion that you need. Whether you want to make it Solar Powered, Splashproof, Workproof or turn it into a portable Power Bank, we will show you from the beginning how to build it the way you want. 

Ruby's Features:


  • Our Kits are Cheaper (and Greater) than the sum of its parts. 
  • We provide training and support for people with disabilities, and people looking for long term employment. 
  • We are environmentally friendly
  • You will receive access to exclusive content - relating to upgrades, and tips about how to improve sound quality and performance.


    • Each month, we will be releasing updates about how to improve your Ruby, with step by step instructions and tutorial videos.

    Upcoming DIY Projects

    1. How to Make it Solar Powered.
    2. How to give it a Professional Paint Job. 
    3. How to Add a Phone Charger.
    4. How to Add a Touch Screen Monitor. 
    5. How to Add Internet Radio.
    We will consistently be releasing tips about how to improve sound quality, and how to upgrade components to improve power and performance. 




    At my core, I have always been a creator. However, as I went through school, university and work, I lost touch with that nature and found myself pursuing a life, which was regarded as relatively ‘risk-less’. I often found myself too busy to do the things that I was curious about, prioritising my time towards education, work and relationships.

    By chance, I was lucky enough to stumble upon an article detailing how to build a mini speaker. It was not until I was deeply immersed in building that speaker, that I experienced flow. That one project redirected the course of my life, now I find myself completely immersed in a community of creators and innovators, building things from Electronic Bikes to 3D printers. 

    In sharing my story with others it became apparent that very few people had experienced this opportunity.  With that in mind, I wanted to start a Social Enterprise to empower people to unleash their Inner Creator. Our goal is to raise enough funds to build a marketplace, where people can actively collaborate, learn new skills and earn money in the process.

    Oh, and we just happened to design a speaker kit where the end product looks great, sounds great, is better for the environment and has a positive social Impact.







    AMPLFY has teamed up with Substation 33, a Social Enterprise, which recycles Electronic Waste, and provides programs to support people with disabilities and people seeking long-term employment. In doing so, we have created a positive social and environmental impact, reduced the cost of our kit, and made the kit easier to bring to life for our builders.

    For every kit sale, not only will you learn how to build a speaker, but you will also help teach someone the basic skills and theories of electronics. As our kits use recycled computer batteries, dismantling and building battery packs is often too dangerous for people with little to no experience. However, with close supervision and support, Substation 33 is able to properly train people to safely and professionally dismantle, assemble and build battery packs. Such tasks require a basic understanding of electronics, and the skills necessary to use a Soldering Iron. These people are also learning other essential skills such as teamwork and critical thinking, vital to securing positions in the workforce. 

    For the duration of this campaign, many of the 'completed speakers' in the Perks section are built by individuals at Substation 33. 

    Substation 33

    There are several problems within the Portable Bluetooth Speaker industry. It is widely considered to be one of the most saturated and overly competitive markets in the world. Despite creating lower prices, such competition unfortunately generates several problems in the industry. AMPLFY wants to re-imagine the way speakers are used and produced in order to eliminate these issues. To make this a reality we need your support.  

    The Problem with the Bluetooth Speaker Industry: 

    1. Speakers are no longer built to last. It is common practice to replace an entire unit once a better version is released or technology improves. This adds to our electronic waste problem. 
    2. The majority of portable Bluetooth speakers are manufactured in foreign countries with poor working conditions, where workers receive less than the living wage they actually require.
    3. Mass manufacturing has reduced the price of speakers, however customers still pay high premiums due to marketing efforts and increased perception of value. In most instances, these margins are not dispersed evenly among all employees of the company. 
    4. R & D Investment goes directly towards innovations in speaker technology, however ignores issues which need our immediate attention, such as environmental and social issues. 
    5. Due to the highly competitive nature of the market, traditional businesses have no incentive to share their learning and knowledge with customers and competitors. 

    A Revolutionary Platform:

    Not everyone wants to build their own speaker, that’s why we want to give people the ‘choice’ to purchase unique speakers, which are built locally, are better for the environment and have a positive social impact.

    How AMPLFY Does it Better:

    1. A speaker designed to last – which can be upgraded / fixed at any time.
    2. Anyone is able to build a speaker and earn money from selling it.
    3. A completely transparent marketplace, where money is paid directly to the person who built the speaker.
    4. Speaker innovations are derived from the crowd and money that is spent on each kit helps address environmental and social concerns.
    5. AMPLFY is incentivised to share knowledge with the community, in order to improve the overall quality of speakers within the marketplace. 

    Our aim is to empower the world to become tinkerers, creators and innovators. However, in order to do this we need to build a platform where people can learn a new skill and get paid. You can support us by sharing our campaign on Facebook, or purchasing one of our Perks.

story:
OTO is a powerful, geometrically intuitive multimedia controller that gives you access to multiple axes of continuous control, and a vast array of distinct, discrete, touch/orientation-defined states, all at once, in the palm of your hand.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Whether you’re an experienced producer or just getting started, OTO lets you access a unique, multidimensional sonic palette. Start playing right out of the box with our software on Desktop and Mobile, or MIDI map it to your favorite DAW.

Use one OTO on its own to control multiple parameters; connect multiple devices simultaneously to control a whole live set with maximum precision and creativity. It’s up to you.

 

OTO combines gestural-control and touch-sensing in a geometrically-intuitive interface that’s unlike any controller you’ve ever played with.

 

You can use OTO on its own as a synthesizer interface and DJ tool with our custom software on Desktop and Mobile, or as a MIDI controller for your favorite Audio Software that you're already using.

Each OTO controller houses an IMU and touch electrodes that communicate with a host computer via a lightweight Bluetooth 4.0 stack. The host computer or mobile device translates the raw physical data into the musicalized output that users hear and see. MIDI notes, CC data, frequency bands and filter-sweeps, even visualizations… with OTO the possibilities are endless: play synths, DJ, perform live electronic music, and even control your favorite Digital Audio Workstations such as Ableton and Traktor. Each set of OTO controllers will ship with a suite of both standalone and DAW controller software, meaning both novice and experienced artists, musicians, DJs alike can use OTO exactly how they want.

 

 

 

 

 

FAQ:

How does it work?

OTO is a combination touch and gestural multimedia controller. A plastic polyhedric enclosure houses a combination gyroscope/accelerometer, capacative touch-sensors, and a micro-controller, which connect via Bluetooth to a host computer or phone, where our custom software musicalizes the sensor data according to the context.

Does OTO require special software?

OTO runs with our custom software that includes tabs for Synthesizer, MIDI, DJ, and VJ functionality on Desktop, and Synth/DJ functionality on Mobile. You can use OTO with nothing but the included software, or use it to control other Audio software via MIDI/OSC.

What operating system do I need?

The OTO Desktop software is available on Windows and OSX. Note that Windows users should have Windows 10 with Bluetooth 4.0 supported hardware. OSX users with a pre-2013 Mac will need to purchase a BLE-USB dongle (widely available for ~$10) to add BLE support for their Mac. We are also working on a mobile app for iOS 9.0 and above (still pre-release, but to be bundled with IndieGoGo shipping).

How does it charge?

You can charge OTO wirelessly using any QI-compliant wireless charger. You can also charge it directly via micro-USB using the internal charging port.

story:
During connection, Mivo Fox uses the Neodymium iron boron powerful magnet. NdFeB’s magnetic strength possesses the highest product performance, its forging process is complex, and the small area's magnetic solder link is exquisite technology.

 

When the earbuds are not in use, they can be taken off and hooked around the neck.

 

The casting process of liquid silicone is done through LSR injection molding, which is often used in baby products and medical products. However, most sports headphones use solid silica gel, which is often used in industrial products such as rubber.  Long-term use can prove to be detrimental to the human body.

 

The aluminum alloy tube has a built-in battery that can charge the earbuds when they are connected.  Its texture is light, rust-resistant, and is gorgeous.

With suppressed GSM/TDMA noise and RF noise-cancelling, MIVO FOX will give you a crystal-clear call experience.

 

 

MIVO’s cutting-edge chips allow both earbuds to operate in a master mode, which means each earbud can receive and transmit audio signals individually, offering seamless transit from two to either one freely.  

  • Pair Automatically
  • Dispair by Charging Case

 

Earphone= WALKIE-TALKIE
 

We also develop an APP for Mivo Fox---- Talkman.  This App can turn Mivo Fox into a walkie-talkie

​
