story:
The PowerTRIP Boomr-Duo is designed with the latest tech in Intelligent-Bluetooth Interface allowing synchronized connection between 2 Boomr-Duos. No Wifi needed!  Play music on 2 Boomr-Duos simultaneously with 1 device at distances over 100 feet from each other and your Bluetooth device.


With the on-board voice and button control interface, you have complete remote action with your phone or device for Siri commands, phone calls, music, channel/volume options, and so much more. 

    

Now you can use the Boomr-Duos to fill the house with the sound of music or your favorite Netflix program. Or take them outside where they really shine and fill the pool or patio with music from multiple directions. Just connect with one Boomr with any phone or bluetooth device. The Boomr Duos will take it from there and automatically pair with each other. 

     

We have molded the Boomr-Duo with heavy aluminum and hard rubber for the most extreme and tough environmental conditions such as full water submersion and drops on hard surfaces from over 30 feet high.

Float It | Dip It | Clip It | Stick It | Call It

  • Rated IP-X7 (Submersible in Water)
  • Casted with rubber and aluminum
  • Crisp sound and booming outdoor volume
  • Intelligent Bluetooth 4.0 phone integration
  • Built-in mic for speaker phone calls & voice commands
  • Compatible with all Bluetooth devices
  • Includes a heavy-duty lock-down suction cup for glass, mirror, tile, & more
  • Karabiner for hanging from backpacks, gear, river tubes, & more
  • Mini-raft for water floatation
  • 5 button operation controls, change songs, adjust volume, phonecalls, voice commands, & more
  • Integrated with Siri for voice commands
  • Works with all phones and Bluetooth devices (iPhone, Android, iPads, iPods, MP3, Tablets, Computers, & more)
Any Questions? Email us: info@productcreationsgroup.com

OUR STORY

The PowerTRIP Boomr-Duo was created by Product Creations Group. 

Product Creations Group (PCG) is a team and network of Product Developers, Dreamers, and Manufacturers. 

Based in Austin Texas, PCG created the PowerTRIP Lifestyle Electronics Brand and now the Boomr-Duo. 

The PCG team was founded by Zachary Martin, and started by licensing products to other brand labels. Our team has always had a passion and talent for developing quality electronics that support active and adventurous lifestyles. With our own brand label, we can finally build items to our own higher standards without compromise to quality for distributors who want cheaper production costs.

Our team has been designing and building products for 6 years. However, we've just recently begun our journey with our own brand label. Your contribution will jump-start our production of the new Boomr Duo and allow us to show real viability in the retail market. With success, we plan to expand our team of innovators and add more exciting Lifestyle Electronic innovations to the PowerTRIP label.

We couldn't be more thankful to our fans who have encouraged us to take this leap and our Pre-Sale Investors who will ultimately make it happen!

We are production ready today! All prototypes have been tested and approved by our talented team of Product Engineers, Designers, & Quality Control Specialists. Our factory is on Stand-by and production time is only 30 days.

Thanks so much for your support!


WHO WE ARE

PCG was founded and organized by Zachary Martin in 2010. It can be said Product Creations Group started much earlier as Zach began developing his first successful product long before PCG was founded. Zach was born in Kansas with an entrepreneurial trail blazing spirit. Zach learned early the key to his passion is connecting talented Inventors and Product Developers to collectively build innovations into real products available to the mass market.

After developing the first emergency cell phone charger, Zach founded Product Creations Group. The initial product launch sold nearly 1 million units with a successful TV campaign in 2010.

PCG VISION

The PCG vision is simple, bring innovative creators and inventors together to build ideas into products which solve real world problems, help people, inspire youth, and enjoy the adventures along the way.

CAMPAIGN GOAL

Our goal is at least 1,000 pre-sale orders. Our factory partner has agreed to support or campaign pricing at this lower quantity with the shared hope that we can hit our goal or better on Indiegogo and begin growing our sales with orders on the open market. We have many industry players watching and hoping for success.

If we don't reach our goal of 1,000 pre-sale orders, we will still deliver as planned, even if it's only a few hundred units. However, we believe 1,000 pre-sale orders is a modest goal considering our aggressive 2 speaker offer. With so much support and encouragement from our current fans, we are confident we'll make this goal or better.

Here's What You Get!

For your support and generous Pre-Sale Investment, we are offering 2 Boomr-Duos for the retail price of 1 Boomr Duo. This is a $150 value. So for half the price, you will be ready to put the Dual-Connection functionality to use right away! Your speakers will arrive within 45 to 60 days of the campaign end date. Your Boomr Duos will come in special retail packaging and will include 2 karabiners, 2 flotation tubes, 2 lock-down suction cups, and 2 Boomr recharge cables. 

PowerTRIP Perks Are In-Stock & Ship Immediately!

We also have re-enforced our Pre-Sale Investment Offer with some really cool perks from our product portfolio. These bonus items are meant to excite, encourage, and reward our EARLY-BIRD Pre-Sale Investors. For a very small additional amount, you can choose between the perks shown below. 

Please understand, our perks are not cheap items. They are all high-quality stocked items from our PowerTRIP Brand to show our sincere gratitude. We can only offer a limited number of each perk.


Perk 1: PowerTRIP Triton Charger (Waterproof)

Charge your Boomr-Duos with the PowerTRIP Triton Backup Battery!
In Stock: Ships Today

   

Rated IP67, the TRITON can be totally submerged in water! Fast, powerful, and rugged w/on-board flashlight, mountaineering loops, laser, and SOS signal! Cast and Sealed with a solid Rubber mold, the 5800mAh of power can charge your phone, devices & your Boomr-Dous multiple times!

(Retail $35.95) In-Stock and ships immediately!

         

Any Questions? Email us: info@productcreationsgroup.com

Perk 2: Aqua Jelly 

(Waterproof Phone Pouch)

Keep your phone bone-dry while you play music on the Boomr Duos!

In Stock: Ships Today

(Retail $14.95) In-Stock and ships immediately!

Keep your phone dry while you connect and stream music to your Boomr-Duo with Bluetooth. 

The Aqua Jelly is a universal waterproof phone pouch. Submerge your phone to 30 FT deep and instantly turn your smartphone into a waterproof camera! Touchscreen friendly material allows texting and full use of the phone inside the pouch. You can even talk through the protective film. 

  • Universal fit for all smartphones (Inside pouch 7.75” x 3.75”)
  • Triple Seal! Double fold! Submersible 30 Feet Deep! NO LEAKS! 
  • Includes lanyard to prevent phone loss on the river or lake!

    

Any Questions? Email us: info@productcreationsgroup.com


Perk 3: PowerTRIP Elite Charger

Professional grade charger for the most powerful devices. Charge your Boomr-Duos or your iPad with the Elite 13000!

In stock: Ships today

         

Top of it's class and coined the Gentlemen’s Charger by Hammacher Schlemmer, the Elite Charger 13000 provides ultimate mass power capacity at 13,000mAh. Fully charge tablets, iPads, smart phones. Fully charge two devices at once with USB port and built-in cable while enjoying the fastest possible charge with an astounding 2.4 Amp output using advanced Micro Controller technology. 

With the classy professional profile, travel in style with your Elite 13000 and never worry about low power again.

(Retail $79.95) In-Stock and ships immediately!

     

Any Questions? Email us: info@productcreationsgroup.com


Perk 4: Pro Fit-Band & Heart Rate Monitor

HEART RATE TRACKER - PRO FIT BAND!

Wireless water-resistant Bluetooth fitness tracking band with NEW (HR sensor Silicon labs Si1142) HEARTBEAT SENSOR!

Not in Stock: Ships with the Boomr Duo Speakers

All the perks of a Fitness Tracker + Latest Tech in fitness tracking! Track more than just your steps, you can now chart your heart rate day and night!

Colors Available: black, blue, orange, purple, green. Please note preferred color during checkout. Email your color choice to info@productcreationsgroup.com

Water-resistant Bluetooth fitness tracking band. Download the latest "Very Fit 2.0" app to Apple or Android and begin tracking heart rate, steps, sleep, calories, date, time. Connect on the go and receive discrete calls, texts, e-mail notifications, and vibration alarm. Set goals and track your stats with the App!

                              

  • Sensor Kionix kx022-1020
  • HR sensor Silicon labs Si1142
  • CPU Chip Nordic nRF51822
  • Vibration: Yes
  • Water resistant
  • Size & Type 0.49''OLED
  • Bluetooth BLE Bluetooth 4.0 Sync
  • Other  Operate: Lift Wrist Time Display
  • Data Storage: 7 days
  • Battery: Li-Ion
  • Capacity 70 mAh
  • Input Voltage DC3.7V/25mA
  • Standby Time 7-10 days
  • Charging : 2 point connect charge
  • Charge Time 90 minutes
  • CE ROHS FCC
Any Questions? Email us: info@productcreationsgroup.com
story_txt:
The PowerTRIP Boomr-Duo is designed with the latest tech in Intelligent-Bluetooth Interface allowing
synchronized connection between 2 Boomr-Duos. No Wifi needed!  Play music on 2 Boomr-Duos simultaneously with 1 device at distances over 100 feet from each other and your Bluetooth device.


With the on-board voice and button control interface, you have complete remote action with your phone or device for Siri commands, phone calls, music, channel/volume options, and so much more. 




    
Now you can use the Boomr-Duos to fill the house with the sound of music or your favorite Netflix program. Or take them outside where they really shine and fill the pool or patio with music from multiple directions. Just connect with one Boomr with any phone or bluetooth device. The Boomr Duos will take it from there and automatically pair with each other. 

     
We have molded the Boomr-Duo with heavy aluminum and hard rubber for the most
extreme and tough environmental conditions such as full water submersion and drops on hard surfaces from over 30 feet high.


Float It | Dip It | Clip It | Stick It | Call It


Rated IP-X7 (Submersible in Water)
Casted with rubber and aluminum
Crisp sound and booming outdoor volume
Intelligent Bluetooth 4.0 phone integration
Built-in mic for speaker phone calls & voice commands
Compatible with all Bluetooth devices
Includes a heavy-duty lock-down suction cup for glass, mirror, tile, & more
Karabiner for hanging from backpacks, gear, river tubes, & more
Mini-raft for water floatation
5 button operation controls, change songs, adjust volume, phonecalls, voice commands, & more
Integrated with Siri for voice commands
Works with all phones and Bluetooth devices (iPhone, Android, iPads, iPods, MP3, Tablets, Computers, & more)


Any Questions? Email us: info@productcreationsgroup.com

story:
Introducing Pair Pills. Patent Pending.

How do Pair Pills Simplify Wireless?

  • Instantaneous wireless audio streaming. Simply plug and play
    • Removes time wasted syncing to bluetooth.
    • Quickly pass music role to a friend
    • Some vehicles force you to be in "Park" before even connecting to Bluetooth
  • Saves up to 30% Battery Life using Aux Jack vs. Bluetooth Option
  • Provides wireless option for vehicles, stereos, and headphones without a Bluetooth Feature.

 

What you will get

Pair Pills will have 3 main components. 2 Pills and 1 Charging dock. Each Pill will be plugged into the Auxiliary jack of your phone and the other into the jack of your stereo system/vehicle. 

There will be 2 Charging options available, a wall mount and a car charger.

 

Risks & Challenges

We are 100% committed to making Pair Pills the best they can possibly be. We want nothing more than to make all of our supporters and future users happy. We are held back in the pre-production phase as we are short on funds to move forward.

  • Please donate and help Pair Pills come to life.
  • We are actively seeking investment opportunities as well.
  • info@pairpills.com

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Share our campaign on social media and follow us to keep up with updates! (@thePairPills)
  • Share our YouTube Video
  • Tweet us!

That's all there is to it! We love connecting with our supporters and hearing your voices. Tweet us, Facebook us, Email us, anything you have will help us tremendously!

 

Our Team

Bailey Thorpe and Zak Jones invented the concept of Pair Pills after countless 5+ hour road trips filled with audio problems. Whether it was a shorted out auxiliary cord or glitchy Bluetooth connection, the two knew a solution needed to be set in place. The duo has left their University in pursuit of their dream to make Pair Pills come to life. They believe that the technology will appeal to all age groups and make streaming music much more simple and efficient. 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

HOW DO THEY WORK?

Pair Pills are pre-synced Auxiliary devices. Simply plug a pill into each aux jack and press play. It's that simple.

 

HOW WILL THEY HAVE POWER?

Pair Pills will have a substantial amount of battery life and offer LED displays to keep track of battery percentage. They will come with a charging dock to connect the Pills to whenever you are not using the set. 

 

WHAT COLOR WILL THEY BE?

We plan to provide a wide variety of color choices for our Pair Pills. Leave us feedback... What colors do you want to see?

 

WHEN CAN I BUY A PAIR

We are striving to have Pair Pills available to the public in early 2017. But stick with us and you will be among the first to receive an order!

story:
Who we are:  Chicken-Like Birds

Most of you who are reading this will know us as that quirky roots duo that acts like a married couple, might as well be siblings but in the end are really just the best of friends.  We play a mix of genres such as swing, rag, blues, country and throw in some elements you wouldn't always expect in those genres.  Essentially our music is a mix of the past meeting the present.  We tip our hats to country blues legends like Mississippi John Hurt, swing aficionados such as Cab Calloway, western swingers like Bob Wills, ragtime rollers, stride champions and country crooners.  We keep one foot planted in the past and one in the present, holding in high regard those that are pushing boundaries today, writing damn good songs and touring like addicts.  Our goal with music is to create songs that have something a bit unexpected in them yet to remain musical and engaging. Our live shows are never the same twice, full of fun stories, a wee bit of dancing, crisp vocals, poignant harmonies, relatable lyrics  and entertaining on-stage banter.  

Our Album:  Wild Returns

This will be our third official recording project during the three years we've been a duo.  Once it was decided to make a new album and utilize Patrick Alexandre as a producer (you might know him as the bass player in the F-Holes or from his solo career or from playing with and co-producing Little Miss Higgins and the Winnipeg Five's Juno nominated album Bison Ranch Recording Sessions) we turned to our fans for guidance in naming our new album.  We asked our email list if they had any ideas what the album name should be and Katie Liebault replied back with the suggestion of Wild Returns.  Needless to say it hit us in just the right spot and soon Ari wrote a song with the title.  It works on a few levels, one where we are expecting wild returns from this album in the form of fame and fortune (haha, kidding!) and also where we are constantly hoping to connect back to that more animal way of being.  Since we have recently made the plunge and moved out to the country we feel like Wild Returns reflects the transition we've recently undergone.  

Track List:

1. Nice Feeling Blues (an upbeat blues song that you will hear in the pitch video)

2. Willy Nilly (a weird song with lot's of time changes)

3. Chicken Coop (an oldie of ours that's been re-done, a true story, a silly silly song)

4. Apple Tree  (a song that Ari wrote while we were recording, inspired by an apple tree in St. Andrews by the sea that Ari had sat under)

5. Dancing on A Cloud  (a swing song for our dancing friends)

6. Bury the Dog  (sometimes you just need to let a relationship go)

7. Wild Returns  (title track, I'd say it is a beast of a song)

8. Ratbug  (a bit of a rockabilly tune about a friends car)

9. Lonely Lullaby  (it's just as it sounds)

10. Ragtime Cowboy Joe  (an old tune from 1912 that we really love)

The Location - Ghostown Blues in Maple Creek Sask.

Let's set the scene of where we recorded.  We were on our way back home from our cross Canada tour and planned to record at a cosy pioneer style town/BnB called Ghostown Blues in Maple Creek Saskatchewan.  Though it was only early October, we arrived to a recent dumping of snow and it was quite chilly.  Owner Greg Hisey is a lover of good music and his BnB is a refuge to those travelling musicians who have had the pleasure of befriending him.  He was very interested in our project, and entertained us all week long with cowboy stories and all sorts of wacky anecdotes.  Our week was spent in an old church that Greg had carefully converted into a central dining area/saloon, and which we converted into our personal recording studio.  Patrick arrived and we set to work making homemade baffles out of used pallets, insulation and burlap.  It looked like we had made an indoor stable.  Patricks tape machine, input board, pre-amps, microphones, and chords were assembled, sounds were captured and they sounded goooooood.  Reeeeeeeal good.  Not only was Patrick producing our album but he was also sound engineering and playing drums.  Almost every song on the album was done without any overdubs.  What you hear is the three of us jamming, no punch in's, no tom-foolery, this is what we sound like.  The only exceptions are Patrick adding some killer harp action on Nice Feeling Blues and Ari adding some lofty trumpet on Dancing on A Cloud.  

Why this project is neat!

This project will be a very trans-Canada project indeed.  Both Ari and I are from Alberta but have been living in BC for three years and it was recorded in Saskatchewan with a producer from Manitoba on our way home from touring through the eastern provinces.  We went all the way to Newfoundland on our trip, falling in love with Canada's national parks along the way.  We had some amazing house shows in Ontario, crossed the longest covered bridge in New Brunswick, got taken in by lovers of music in Nova Scotia and Newfoundland, were captivated by the red mud of PEI, travelled close to 20,000km's and we even went to Hull* and back on this trip.  

*For those that don't know there's a bridge in Ottawa that goes to the Quebec town Hull; my dad was particularly fond of this joke.

ALSO!!

This album is going to have some seriously sweet artwork done by Ari's fiancé, Cate Currie.  And Ari will be doing up a booklet that will have some snippets of our journal entries while we were recording, complete with little drawings and sayings from Greg.

This album has been unlike any other album for us from the recording process, to the inspiring location and working with Patrick.  We've already invested into the recording and mixing process and stand behind this project fully.  We believe that you will dig it too.  

 

 

Why we want $4,000

The goal is to raise $4,000 so that we can cover:

Mastering $60 a song x 10 songs = $600

Artwork                                                      $450

Printing for 300 copies                         $1360

Shipping                                                     $90

Publicity/Marketing                               $1500

 

____________________________________________

Total                                                           =$4,000

 

Risks & Challenges

It's always risky doing what you love, putting huge amounts of time, money and passion into something creative and hoping that people will get it.  But considering how awesome this album is going to be we know it was worth all of the risk and we really can not wait to share it with all of you.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Share!  Recommend our album to folks at different radio stations.  Come see us play a show sometime.  Put our music on your playlists.  Like, Subscribe, etc, on all the things because we are on all the things.    THANKS EVERYONE!!!

Our live shows are never the same twice, full of fun stories, a wee bit of dancing, crisp vocals, poignant harmonies, relatable lyrics  and entertaining on-stage banter.  
Our Album:  Wild Returns
This will be our third official recording project during the three years we've been a duo.  Once it was decided to make a new album and utilize Patrick Alexandre as a producer (you might know him as the bass player in the F-Holes or from his solo career or from playing with and co-producing Little Miss Higgins and the Winnipeg Five's Juno nominated album Bison Ranch Recording Sessions) we turned to our fans for guidance in naming our new album.  We asked our email list if they had any ideas what the album name should be and Katie Liebault replied back with the suggestion of Wild Returns.  Needless to say it hit us in just the right spot and soon Ari wrote a song with the title.  It works on a few levels, one where we are expecting wild returns from this album in the form of fame and fortune (haha, kidding!) and also where we are constantly hoping to connect back to that more animal way of being.  Since we have recently made the plunge and moved out to the country we feel like Wild Returns reflects the transition we've recently undergone.  
Track List:
1. Nice Feeling Blues (an upbeat blues song that you will hear in the pitch video)
2. Willy Nilly (a weird song with lot's of time changes)
3. Chicken Coop (an oldie of ours that's been re-done, a true story, a silly silly song)
4. Apple Tree  (a song that Ari wrote while we were recording, inspired by an apple tree in St. Andrews by the sea that Ari had sat under)
5. Dancing on A Cloud  (a swing song for our dancing friends)
6. Bury the Dog  (sometimes you just need to let a relationship go)
7. Wild Returns  (title track, I'd say it is a beast of a song)
8. Ratbug  (a bit of a rockabilly tune about a friends car)
9. Lonely Lullaby  (it's just as it sounds)
10. Ragtime Cowboy Joe  (an old tune from 1912 that we really love)
The Location - Ghostown Blues in Maple Creek Sask.
Let's set the scene of where we recorded.  We were on our way back home from our cross Canada tour and planned to record at a cosy pioneer style town/BnB called Ghostown Blues in Maple Creek Saskatchewan.  Though it was only early October, we arrived to a recent dumping of snow and it was quite chilly.  Owner Greg Hisey is a lover of good music and his BnB is a refuge to those travelling musicians who have had the pleasure of befriending him.  He was very interested in our project, and entertained us all week long with cowboy stories and all sorts of wacky anecdotes.  Our week was spent in an old church that Greg had carefully converted into a central dining area/saloon, and which we converted into our personal recording studio.  Patrick arrived and we set to work making homemade baffles out of used pallets, insulation and burlap.  It looked like we had made an indoor stable.  Patricks tape machine, input board, pre-amps, microphones, and chords were assembled, sounds were captured and they sounded goooooood.  Reeeeeeeal good.  Not only was Patrick producing our album but he was also sound engineering and playing drums.  Almost every song on the album was done without any overdubs.  What you hear is the three of us jamming, no punch in's, no tom-foolery, this is what we sound like.  The only exceptions are Patrick adding some killer harp action on Nice Feeling Blues and Ari adding some lofty trumpet on Dancing on A Cloud.  
Why this project is neat!
This project will be a very trans-Canada project indeed.  Both Ari and I are from Alberta but have been living in BC for three years and it was recorded in Saskatchewan with a producer from Manitoba on our way home from touring through the eastern provinces.  We went all the way to Newfoundland on our trip, falling in love with Canada's national parks along the way.  We had some amazing house shows in Ontario, crossed the longest covered bridge in New Brunswick, got taken in by lovers of music in Nova Scotia and Newfoundland, were captivated by the red mud of PEI, travelled close to 20,000km's and we even went to Hull* and back on this trip.  
*For those that don't know there's a bridge in Ottawa that goes to the Quebec town Hull; my dad was particularly fond of this joke.
ALSO!!
This album is going to have some seriously sweet artwork done by Ari's fiancé, Cate Currie.  And Ari will be doing up a booklet that will have some snippets of our journal entries while we were recording, complete with little drawings and sayings from Greg.
This album has been unlike any other album for us from the recording process, to the inspiring location and working with Patrick.  We've already invested into the recording and mixing process and stand behind this project fully.  We believe that you will dig it too.  
 
 

Why we want $4,000
The goal is to raise $4,000 so that we can cover:
Mastering $60 a song x 10 songs = $600
Artwork                                                      $450
Printing for 300 copies                         $1360
Shipping                                                     $90
Publicity/Marketing                               $1500
 
____________________________________________
Total                                                           =$4,000
 
Risks & Challenges
It's always risky doing what you love, putting huge amounts of time, money and passion into something creative and hoping that people will get it.  But considering how awesome this album is going to be we know it was worth all of the risk and we really can not wait to share it with all of you.  

Other Ways You Can Help
Share!  Recommend our album to folks at different radio stations.  Come see us play a show sometime.  Put our music on your playlists.  Like, Subscribe, etc, on all the things because we are on all the things.    THANKS EVERYONE!!!

story:
Introducing Very Important Puppets™

Satirical Digital Assistants

Very Important Puppets are a hilarious intersection of media, technology, and political satire. Stream music, have a conversation, set alarms, send voice pranks, order food, and have a conversation with caricatures of real-life figures. Unlike Alexa, Siri, or Google Home, VIPs are humorous, and are personality-based with distinct voices and word choices modeled from real people. Rather than being scripted by corporate employees, VIP dialog is continually extracted from public sources, such as Twitter feeds and interviews, and intelligently woven into common home and digital assistant speech. The result is a continuously entertaining assistant.

 

Features

Features you can expect from the initial release: personal assistant commands including alarms, weather, calendar, sports, and music; and conversational features including messaging, avatars, dictation and conversation. 

Puppet to Puppet Interaction – Puppets can also engage with each other, indefinitely, in a ping pong-like conversation, exchanging commentary, questions, and insults. Get two or more puppets together to start a group conversation and just listen to them debate.  

 

Alarms: Tired of waking up to mariachi ringtones? Try a stern warning from a global mafia leader or other silly dialog as you attempt to snooze. 

 

 

Music – Shuffle music with an integrated Spotify app, or let the characters get their DJ on as they select their favorite tracks with accompanying dance lights. 

 

Dictation – Speak through your puppet using his voice in real time by entering voice or text phrases in your mobile app. Great for pranking your roommate, or your manager if you're brave. Or just do it for the Insta.

 

Messaging – If you've been wanting to anonymously fire the entire IT department, now's your chance. Send and share voice messages from your phone by speaking or typing phrases, selecting a voice font, adding a character emoji, then hit Send. Get your point across better than any AR emoji. 

 

Puppet to Person Interaction – Have unique and hilarious conversations with your puppet about anything from current events to the best way to marinate a steak. 
 

 

Customize your puppet avatar with awesome digital swag. 

  

Tech Specs

 

Pairing the Device to your Phone

 

Larger Than Life Personalities

Mr. President – He may not be yuuuuge, but this tiny billionaire will give you a run for your money. With anatomically proportionate hands to match, Mr. President is sure to grab your attention. Comes with a golf club and an attitude.

Comrade – Conniving and methodical, you’re lucky you caught him with his shirt on. The Russian may have you questioning who the real puppet is… him or you? Comes with hockey stick and pile of gold bricks.

Dear Leader – He seems to have all the facts despite banning Google. Don’t push the Supreme Leader’s buttons—you never know what could make him go off. Comes with handheld bazooka. 

Dimensions - 6-inch tall vinyl figure on a 1-inch device. Decorate your office for shenanigans, bring some authority to your home or take them on car rides — VIP puppets are perfectly sized for any room or office.

Picture perfect. Stable on flat surfaces and with movable arms and head, we designed the puppets to be captured from every angle. Add them to your collection of vinyl puppets or give them the spotlight. They would just prefer you don’t share the bad photos.

We thought our tech is so cool, we filed two trademarks: Personality Font® and Artificial Intelligence Meets Bobbleheads℠. Spot-on speed, pitch and words make our puppets’ choice of words and voice sound like caricatures of their life-sized compatriots, as they engage you with witty banter. We created a unique dialog engine with a humorous pragmatic parser, which is a sophisticated tool for understanding and generating nuanced language. The voices are built using deep neural network (DNN) algorithms, based on actual speeches and interviews. Read more about our backend below. 

 

Package Design

Yep, we thought of that, too. We may think outside the box, but we also took time to think about the box itself.

 

Perks

Reserve your VIP before anyone else when you support us on IndieGoGo. Here's a breakdown of the perks you can choose from when you support this campaign. Select your perk from the sidebar at the top of this page.

 

In the Press

 

         

 

Current Stage of Development

 

We currently have a working prototype, package design, dialog engine architecture and app design. We're now focused on:

  • Finalizing the engineering schematics for the final product
  • Developing and iterating on the user experience for the mobile app
  • Training the dialog engine
  • Licensing agreements with branded people and characters. 

We will soon begin the process of:

  • Product certifications
  • Working with existing supply chain relationships to spec out manufacturing
  • Shipping logistics
  • Larger scale production.

 

Why We Need Your Support

Your support will allow us to initiate tooling and manufacturing so we can make VIPs available to you and the millions of people suffering from boring, corporate personal digital assistants and home speakers. Let's make our daily routines and personal assistants more engaging, funny, and politically incorrect. 

So why should you support us?

  • Be the first to get one (and we mean FIRST).
  • Most unique, best-designed and humorous toy and robot on the market.  
  • Add a whole new dimension to your vinyl doll collection.

​

Stretch Goals

After reaching our initial goals and manufacture, we will expand the app, add more helpful functions, and expand the line of characters. 

The base campaign includes three puppets, our unique conversational features, and humorous yet functional assistant features. At $100,000, we will add more of your favorite politicians, and additional assistant functions. At $155,000, we'll produce an addictive interactive game. Your custom avatar can battle their political nemesis, reaching ever greater levels of performance. 

     

    Meet the VIP Team

     

    Jessica Cohen, Founder
    Jessica is a product designer with domain expertise in artificial intelligence, Internet of Things, user experience and industrial design. 

     

     

    Ernesto Yau Zhong, Co-Founder and Product Owner
    Product designer with a background in furniture design and UX, recently graduated with a bachelor’s in industrial design. Ernesto is a politics junkie and very funny guy. 

     

    Scott Wetterschneider, Sculptor
    World-renowned designer and creative director, specializing in 3D illustration, animation and toys. 

     

     

    Valerio Basile, PhD, Computational Linguistics Scientist
    Computer scientist, semanticist and NLP practitioner, with experience in software architecture and development, and database administration.

     

    Aleksandr Kapustiak, UX Designer & Animator
    2D artist and animator for game development, UI design and logo design. Creates beautiful, easy-to-use apps.

     

     

    Ayrton Estrella Alcocer, Electrical Engineer
    Ayrton is a designer and developer of home automation, robotics, electronics, and computer engineering projects. He also teaches classes in microcontroller programming. 

     

    Srikanta Dora, Web Developer
    Srikanta is an expert front-end developer, with experience in PHP, CSS, MySQL, Ajax, and HTML. Srikanta particularly enjoys working with startups.

     

     

    The Technology

    While chatbots in ecommerce websites and standalone home devices are becoming commonplace, they focus on baseline Q&A - question and answer. While this is very useful, their conversational style is generic and emotionless. We thought something was missing: personality.

    Enter VIPs, a new way of integrating human-like personality traits within the dialogue system. Think of this as the indy version of big tech companies’ robots. We developed a flexible, innovative model of personality based on a multi-dimensional representation. Our proprietary “Personality Matrix ™” model is trained on hundreds of thousands of speeches, interviews and Tweets, spoken by actual, highly-opinionated people. The data we collect is manually labeled by experts according to a carefully crafted set of rules, which map semantic and pragmatic features, such as function, intent, sentiment, and syntax. Machine learning algorithms are trained on our data set in order to match the input from the user to the most appropriate answer, in terms of accuracy, but also injecting humorous and subjective features into the conversation. The result is a library of virtual assistants who talk to you in a caricatured version of their human alter ego. This creates a much more engaging, enjoyable, human-like conversation.


     

    Real Tech Gibberish

    Our API implements full-fledged pipelines for Natural Language Understanding (NLU) and Natural Language Generation (NLG), comprising lexical, morphological and syntactic analysis, semantic parsing and sentiment analysis in the NLU module, and content determination, macro-planning, micro-planning and surface realization in the NLG module. We leverage available state-of-the-art libraries such as the Stanford Parser and SimpleNLG for Natural Language Processing, and high-level libraries for parallel neural computation like Keras, and connect the together mapping their respective representations with custom code.

     

    Risks & Challenges

    As this project has both digital and physical components, it poses some unique challenges for the VIP team. Our strategy for this project is to keep it simple: we are only using known, trusted APIs and manufacturing processes with which we feel comfortable.

    For the dialog engine, it was important for us to develop a digital framework that enables the conversations with our Very Important Puppets™ to be fun and engaging. To accomplish this, we are using trusted APIs from Google and other vendors, which we will customize to create realistic voices and personalities for our puppets. We have already architected the framework and run working prototypes, and are now working on enriching the dialog. 

    For the app, we are licensing known, existing APIs, and stitching them together, adding our unique designs. We are not trying to reinvent the wheel.

    As with all physical products, dealing with production and shipping is always going to be a challenge. To meet these challenges, we have purposely simplified the product specifications to ensure a smooth manufacturing cycle. Regarding hardware, all we are essentially manufacturing are vinyl dolls, which is a very known manufacturing process with a trusted factory in Shenzhen, and, MP3 players, which are also a known product. Our team is working with experienced industry designers, manufacturers and reputable shipping companies to deliver the best product we can to our customers within a reasonable amount of time.

     

    Licensing Opportunities

    If you represent an animated character, celebrity, musician, or any VIP, contact us about licensing opportunities. 

     

    Press Release

    We pride ourselves on responsible journalism. Click here for the VIP Press Release. Contact us at info@veryimportantpuppets for the full press kit. 

     

    Intellectual Property

    We're not paranoid or anything, we just took a page from our puppets, and wanted to let you know that we filed US patent #62673887, trademarks #87602426, #87751076, #88012274. and copyright #1-6101841221. 

     

    The Art of Closing the Deal

    There’s a precedent for a president who just got into politics to be politically incorrect. The founders of Very Important Puppets™ are interested in the creative aspects of language, the science of puns, how leaders communicate and social rules for using language. We saw the irony in those at the very top of the political food chain being the least politically correct. History is being made, and as a passionate linguists, technologists and designers, we wanted in. Call it satire, call it tech, or call it the perfect gift for your uncle. We just call it a good idea.

story:
Product Features 

 

Facts and Details about the T-30 ANC by Kryptic 

 

As featured in the press

 

"After painstakingly looking at every detail of the T-30 for about a month, we were truly satisfied with the pre-production samples. Our team had no complaints whatsoever. The sound quality, the active noise filtering and all the major features put the top branded headphones to shame"

                                                  The Tech Moe Group.

"The ANC feature in the T-30 are simply not a joke. Spoiler! You can't hear any outside noise with the ANC on. One thing we also loved was the superior sound quality, even at maxed volumes. They really put some extra work in these. Kudos to the team for such a great product" 

 

What early testers are saying 

 
The T-30 puts Bose and Sony to shame. Its simple the best 
 

 

0 Noise, Period!

Hate distracting background noises while you're on a solo moment like business call, working out, travel or just trying to enjoy a little needed in a quiet mode? The T-30 from kryptic is for you. Engineered to block noise up to 40db at near 100% efficacy. Don't forget the audiophile ultra premium sound quality.

Great on the stand. 

 

The Touch Control  Feature 

Using the T-30s

Infrared Proximity Sensor 

With a highly accurate infrared proximity sensing technology, the headphones automatically pause and play your music when you remove or wear your headphones respectively 

 

ANC mode or ambient mode? You decide.

 

Skin Friendly Protein leather around the latest memory foam technology.  Deployed to ensure your maximum comfort.

Technical Specifications 

 

Whats in the box?

* T-30 headphones 

*USb C charging cable 

*3.5mm audio cable

*1/4'" stereo plug adapter 

*Hard case 

*Instructions manual 

 

Testing the T-30 

 

                                   

Eric left the biggest wireless audio company in 2014 over consumer protection concerns. Long story short, he was worried about the company's consistent act of putting profits over consumer protection standards. After many attempts to address these concerns failed, he left and moved to Dallas. Eric met with Kenny (a sound engineer in Dallas) in 2015,  and Kryptic wireless was formed. The main focus was, and still is, to bring high quality wireless audio systems to the masses at great prices without compromising on safety and quality. Kryptic wireless has since formed strategic partnerships, both home and abroad to bring the best to our cherished customers. We have  produced some high end speakers over the last 5 years and have received many praises from our customers. 

Kryptic wireless is constantly looking for new ways to improve users’ listening experience through expert audio engineering and problem solving. With the T-30s Wireless headphones, we are delivering users an all-in-one solution by creating a premium listening device that contains multifaceted features to address every users’ audio tech needs. We are confident, you will love this. 

The Team

At Kryptic, we are so proud to have created the headphones we’ve always dreamed of. We come from all different backgrounds--we’re creators, doers, thinkers, scientists, researchers, engineers, and nerds from all over the world--but the one thing we have in common is courage.

Product is designed and manufactured in the USA.  

 

Guaranteed Fulfillment

Our team is dedicated to the highest quality of product and customer service. We aim to be a premium brand in the audio industry and will prioritize Indiegogo backers as our first customers. Delivery is guaranteed with a 12 month warranty. If there are any issues or questions that you have about Pearl Audio or our products, simply reach out via email or Facebook. 

Satisfaction guaranteed - Return within 14 days for a 100% refund.
story_txt:
Product Features 

 
Facts and Details about the T-30 ANC by Kryptic 


 
As featured in the press
 

"After painstakingly looking at every detail of the T-30 for about a month, we were truly satisfied with the pre-production samples. Our team had no complaints whatsoever. The sound quality, the active noise filtering and all the major features put the top branded headphones to shame"
                                                  The Tech Moe Group.
"The ANC feature in the T-30 are simply not a joke. Spoiler! You can't hear any outside noise with the ANC on. One thing we also loved was the superior sound quality, even at maxed volumes. They really put some extra work in these. Kudos to the team for such a great product" 
 

What early testers are saying 

 
The T-30 puts Bose and Sony to shame. Its simple the best 
 
 

0 Noise, Period!
Hate distracting background noises while you're on a solo moment like business call, working out, travel or just trying to enjoy a little needed in a quiet mode? The T-30 from kryptic is for you. Engineered to block noise up to 40db at near 100% efficacy. Don't forget the audiophile ultra premium sound quality.

Great on the stand. 

 
The Touch Control  Feature 

Using the T-30s

Infrared Proximity Sensor 
With a highly accurate infrared proximity sensing technology, the headphones automatically pause and play your music when you remove or wear your headphones respectively 


 
ANC mode or ambient mode? You decide.

 


Skin Friendly Protein leather around the latest memory foam technology.  Deployed to ensure your maximum comfort.

Technical Specifications 

 



Whats in the box?
* T-30 headphones 
*USb C charging cable 
*3.5mm audio cable
*1/4'" stereo plug adapter 
*Hard case 
*Instructions manual 

 
Testing the T-30 


 

                                   

Eric left the biggest wireless audio company in 2014 over consumer protection concerns. Long story short, he was worried about the company's consistent act of putting profits over consumer protection standards. After many attempts to address these concerns failed, he left and moved to Dallas. Eric met with Kenny (a sound engineer in Dallas) in 2015,  and Kryptic wireless was formed. The main focus was, and still is, to bring high quality wireless audio systems to the masses at great prices without compromising on safety and quality. Kryptic wireless has since formed strategic partnerships, both home and abroad to bring the best to our cherished customers. We have  produced some high end speakers over the last 5 years and have received many praises from our customers. 
Kryptic wireless is constantly looking for new ways to improve users’ listening experience through expert audio engineering and problem solving. With the T-30s Wireless headphones, we are delivering users an all-in-one solution by creating a premium listening device that contains multifaceted features to address every users’ audio tech needs. We are confident, you will love this. 
The Team
At Kryptic, we are so proud to have created the headphones we’ve always dreamed of. We come from all different backgrounds--we’re creators, doers, thinkers, scientists, researchers, engineers, and nerds from all over the world--but the one thing we have in common is courage.
Product is designed and manufactured in the USA.  
 





Guaranteed Fulfillment
Our team is dedicated to the highest quality of product and customer service. We aim to be a premium brand in the audio industry and will prioritize Indiegogo backers as our first customers. Delivery is guaranteed with a 12 month warranty. If there are any issues or questions that you have about Pearl Audio or our products, simply reach out via email or Facebook. 
Satisfaction guaranteed - Return within 14 days for a 100% refund.

story:
INTRODUCING THE CR-3 WALL-MOUNT FOR BOOKSHELF LOUDSPEAKERS


CR-3 Wall-Mount: U.S. Patent 29/530248

VibeFree's CR-3 Wall-Mount Loudspeaker Suspension System separates loudspeakers from distortion-causing, solid surfaces to give you Hi-Def. Sound & Amazing Stereo Imaging.

The CR-3 Wall-Mount Suspension System was created to offer you a method of loudspeaker suspension that is beautiful, effective & safe. 

The CR-3 System is a high-quality product; the result of extensive research, testing, and refinement. VibeFree products are tested & endorsed by Professional Sound Engineers. 

- ANTHONY CIMINO-MUSICIAN & SOUND ENGINEER 

_____________________________________________________________________________ 

"We just installed a VibeFree Loudspeaker Suspension System in our newly redesigned Control Room at our MoJo Pro Recording Studio. The difference in Stereo Imaging is stunning! I have never heard loudspeakers sound like this; the clarity is amazing! The System produced crystal clear sound and stereo imaging in my studio monitors that has to be experienced to be believed".

- ANTHONY CIMINO, SOUND ENGINEER, MOJO PRO AUDIO

_____________________________________________________________________________ 


Whether you are a professional or listen to music for pleasure, the CR-3 will vastly improve your loudspeaker performance with a minimum of installation effort. 


_____________________________________________________________________________ 



ADVERSE EFFECTS OF LOUDSPEAKER VIBRATION

Sound Engineers & Audiophiles know in order to get the best possible Sound & Stereo Image from loudspeakers you must decouple (separate) loudspeakers from distortion-causing surfaces. The effect of placing a loudspeaker on a wall, metal stand, or bookshelf creates vibration between the speaker and the surface it sits on.

These vibrations cause resonance (interaction of sound energy between the loudspeaker & the surface it sits on) in the loudspeaker: this causes sound to distort & blur, resulting in a loss of definition & presence in the Treble, Mid. & Bass ranges. This results in a dramatic loss of Sound quality & Stereo Imaging.

To eliminate distortion in the loudspeaker, you must stop the interaction of sound energy between the loudspeaker & the surface it sits on. The VibeFree CR-3 Wall-Mount solves this problem by suspending the loudspeaker: this gives you the best possible Sound Quality & Stereo Image. 

_____________________________________________________________________________ 

"VibeFree Loudspeaker Suspension Systems are great!" 

- WHIT CRANE, SINGER, UGLY KID JOE & RICHARDS-CRANE 

_____________________________________________________________________________ 


BENEFITS 

Eliminates distortion-greatly enhanced sound quality

  • Live Concert Sound...outstanding voice and instrument separation

  • Amazing Stereo Image

  • Crystal clear High & Mid Ranges, & tight Bass

  • Great for Studio Monitors: tested by, and endorsed by Sound engineers!

  • Perfect for apartments: by suspending off the wall you

    eliminate noise complaints.

  • You can play music at lower levels and

    still get excellent presence

  • Great for Home Theatre systems

_____________________________________________________________________________ 

"VibeFree Loudspeaker Suspension Systems are great! They will add huge dynamic range, clarity & imaging to the speaker system in your home or recording studio. I highly recommend VibeFree Suspension Systems to anyone wanting excellent sound!"

- PHIL DUNGET, SOUND MARKETING RECORDING STUDIOS

_____________________________________________________________________________ 

HOW DOES THE SYSTEM WORK?

(We have an Assembly Video on our www.vibefree.com website) 



The CR-3 suspends loudspeakers by means of a Velcro- lined, Nylon-webbing Strap with Metal ‘O’ rings sown into each end. Our Suspension Straps & Adhesive-backed Pads are made only from U.S. nylon webbing & Velcro materials for their uncompromising quality.

The loudspeaker is securely held in the Suspension Strap using the Velcro Hook & Loop Fastening System. The Nylon-webbing Strap is lined with Velcro 'Loop' material that bonds with the Velcro Adhesive-backed pads that are placed on the loudspeaker (the pads can be removed without damaging the speaker).

The Red steel ‘O’ rings located at each end of the Strap are suspended off our Patented, vibration-isolating Horizontal Support Rod.

The Wall Plate, Wall-Rod & Horizontal Arm are solid, anodized Aircraft-quality Aluminum. 


_____________________________________________________________________________ 


WHAT'S IN THE BOX? 


  • 2 Wall Plates, 2 Wall Rods, & 2 Horizontal Arms (assembled) made from solid Precision-machined Aircraft-quality Aluminum

  • 2 Loudspeaker Suspension Straps (choose from Red or Black).

  • 1 Pkg. Velcro Adhesive-backed Pads

  • 2 Industrial-strength Wall Inserts (will safely suspend a 26 LB. speaker).

  • Colours: choose from White, Black, or Red.


SPECIFICATIONS

The CR-3 Wall-Mount has been Engineer-designed and extensively tested. For example:


WALL PLATE 


WALL ROD 

The CR-3 Suspension System will safely suspend a speaker weighing 26 LBS (heavier for Custom Orders).

The CR-3 System will suspend a speaker measuring a Max. 17” High X 10” Wide: custom Orders for larger speakers available @ www.vibefree.com

Installation is easy & takes about 1 hour: watch our Assembly Video on www.vibefree.com 

_____________________________________________________________________________ 



_____________________________________________________________________________


WHAT SIZE DO I NEED?

Custom sizing to fit your loudspeakers

Just measure the Height & Width of your speaker & let us know & we will custom fit a System for you.

The CR-3 will suspend all Loudspeakers measuring from a Maximum 17" High and 10" Wide to a Minimum 6" High and 4.5" Wide. 

_____________________________________________________________________________ 


“I am a classically trained pianist. VibeFree has dramatically enhanced my listening experience. There’s much greater clarity for symphonic music, as well as for jazz. There is also increased sharpness in the high notes, and overall clarity of vocals. I strongly recommend VibeFree Suspension Systems to the discerning audiophile and anyone who values an enhanced listening experience”.

- ISAAC MOSS 

_____________________________________________________________________________ 



_____________________________________________________________________________ 


WHO WE ARE

Barrie Manton:

  • 35-year Construction Manager & Businessman

  • Diploma: Business Mgt.

  • B.A. Criminology

  • B.A. Minor Applied Psychology

    Lance Penner:

  • 30-year Industrial Electrical Contractor

Leopoldo Diez:

• Masters Degree: Industrial Engineering & Industrial Design

We have a collective 80 years of experience in task coordination & completion, Industrial Engineering & mechanical knowledge. Combined with Barrie’s long-term connections with Sound Engineers, Audiophiles & the Music Industry, this has result in the development of unique & beautiful, high quality Loudspeaker Suspension products. We are dedicated to perfection while striving to provide simplicity & functionality in our designs. 


_____________________________________________________________________________ 



MANUFACTURING

We have 2 excellent manufacturing partners (long-term established) for our Vibefree CR-3: one in Costa Rica, and 1 in Vancouver, B.C. All materials for our Suspension Straps are U.S. made.

  • Our manufacturing base was set up 2 1/2 years ago

  • Our Supply Chain & Manufacturing is together: Max. 8 week

    product delivery

  • Aircraft-quality Aluminum parts (Wall Rods, Horizontal

    Arms, & Wall Plates) made in Costa Rica

  • Loudspeaker Suspension Straps made in Canada

  • Everything is assembled, packaged & shipped from

    Vancouver, B.C., Canada

  • 1-Year 'no quibble' Warranty on Parts & labor 

_____________________________________________________________________________ 

WHERE WE ARE NOW

  • Product Designs are complete

  • The U.S. Patent 29/530248 is in place

  • Prototypes refined, & tested by Sound Engineers

  • Material Suppliers & Manufacturing is in place

  • We have some stock

_____________________________________________________________________________ 

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP 

We decided to move ahead with the CR-3 Wall-Mount Project after we put some pictures of the CR-3 Prototype up on our Facebook page: the response was overwhelming!

Being life-long music lovers, having Musician & Sound Engineer friends, our interest & motivation has always been to try to enhance people's lives through excellent sound. Making $$ is one thing, but hearing someone say WOW! is a great rush too. You can't put a price on seeing someone truly get off on music...

INCREASE STOCK

We have to increase our stock to make the product viable/successful; do a large production run to available at a reasonable price for all.  We have invested a lot of time, energy and $$ in Designs, Prototypes, Sound Tests, and Patents; now we need help to see this project become a success.

So: we have to do a larger production run to drive the costs down, and in (hopeful) anticipation of your support, we have offered the CR-3 on Indiegogo at an Introductory price of 25% off the Retail price of $160- U.S. ($120 U.S. + $15 Shipping = $135 Total cost) (a 'killer' deal). 

We can deliver by the end of Dec. 2015

MARKETING

Secondly, we are a small Company & need help to increase & expand our Marketing efforts across Canada & the U.S. 


_____________________________________________________________________________ 



Thank you for your time & consideration: if you can help with a donation, or purchase, we will take excellent care of you..

If you haven't bought speakers yet, or plan to replace them in the future, you can still take advantage of the 25% off Retail price: just make a Support Donation of $10 & e-mail your contact information to us at info@vibefree.com.  Please remember to send us the Make, Height & Width of your speaker & we will Custom fit a CR-3 System for you.

Barrie, CEO VibeFree 

_____________________________________________________________________________ 


YOU CAN REACH US AT:

Website: www.vibefree.com (info@vibefree.com) 

Facebook: VibeFree Loudspeaker Suspension Systems 

Twitter: @vibefree 





_____________________________________________________________________________

story:
The DIY (Do-It-Yourself) PIXI Square LED is a beautiful 8"x8" can retrofit (5"/6") to replace those harsh, glaring recessed round can lights in your ceilings.  First of its kind, the PIXI Square LED's edge-to-edge diffusion creates soft, even light with no glare, no flicker and no hot spots, making any environment a joy to experience.

  • First 100 Backer Special - 1 PIXI LED Square for $29 + $10 Shipping*
  • Buy 1 PIXI LED Square for $49 + $10 Shipping*
  • Save $37 - Buy 4 PIXI LED Squares for $159 ($39.75 ea.) + $10 Shipping*
  • Save $152 Buy 8 PIXI LED Squares for $240( $30.00ea.) + $10 Shipping*
*$10 flat rate shipping for any perk you choose
  • 1,000 lbs. of Carbon Offset for $10 - receive a digital certificate for your pledge to make your earth a better place.

After initial stock depletion, we will continue to ship orders based on our maximum 120 day manufacturing lead time.

PIXI® Lighting proudly develops innovative, high quality lighting products for projects small and large alike.   Having developed the world’s thinnest LED fixtures (thinner than the width of a dime) with an internal driver, developing new “world’s first” products that embody both art and science of LED technology can be a daunting task.  PIXI continues to challenge conventional methods of lighting, visit www.pixilighting.com to view our full range of products.

We need your support to prove square is the new black.   For the more than one billion recessed cans in U.S. houses and office buildings only round retrofits are available –until now; PIXI presents a new alternative design like none other while simultaneously improving the quality of light.  This campaign is only the initial phase in a series of unique product launches and your valuable patronage will expedite future prototyping, development and manufacturing tooling.  Become part of the PIXI LED Square team by supporting this project for innovative product development of eco-friendly, energy efficient lighting.
